Fabiola es una de las integrantes del grupo, tiene 38 años de edad, en la comunidad todos le conocen como Fabi y solo sus amistades más cercanas le llaman Fiona por su carácter, tiene un hijo de 12  el cual estudia en la escuela de la comunidad, desde hace 16 años Fabi inicio con la venta de ropa para dama y caballero de manera ambulante, comenta que recorría las calles de la comunidad llevando la ropa en un diablito con el fin de mostrar a sus clientes toda la ropa,  el éxito de su actividad ayudada de los prestamos ha sido tal que ha establecido su tienda de ropa en un local ubicado en el centro exhibiendo la ropa en maniquíes y ganchos, Fabi acude una vez al mes a comprar ropa de diferentes modelos, colores, tallas para sus clientes cumpliendo siempre con la demanda de los mismo, hace 3 años decidió integrar la venta de juguetes  siendo las mejores temporadas en navidad, reyes y día del niño.

Desde hace 10 años la cortina de la tienda se levanta a las 8 de la mañana indicando que el servicio ha iniciado, cierra a las 2 de la tarde para acudir a casar y almorzar con su hijo posteriormente regresa a la tienda a las 4 pm a veces acompañada por su hijo y cierra a las 8 de la noche.

“mi actividad y esfuerzo continuo me han permitido ofrecerle lo mejor a mi hijo y no depender de nadie, sentirme útil, productiva y buena guerrera contando con el apoyo de mi familia” son las palabras de doña Fabi quien invertirá el préstamo en la compra de: pantalones, blusas, faldas, playeras, camisetas, vestidos, short, tines para dama y caballero.

El grupo agradece a Visión F México  y KIVA por el préstamo otorgado.

*la fotografía fue tomada en la tienda de doña Fabi , quien viste blusa color morado.
texts.en:
The reservoir is this community's primary tourist attraction. You can see the fisherman go out in their motorboats and rowboats to fish. Then they go by foot to sell their catch in the co-op, or in the palm huts which are located on the shore of the reservoir. The fish are then kept in small tanks, and when diners arrive, these fish are served fresh.
In one of the neighborhoods, a group of 6 people formed to request a loan from Visión F México to grow their businesses. This group chose the name "Avenue 2" because that's the name of the street where their meetings are held. The members of this group are:
Silvestre - he sells shoes
María, Fabiola, Lorena and Mayra - they clothing
Zoila - she sells sodas
Fabiola is one of the members of this group. She is 38 years old, and everybody in the community knows her as "Fabi", though her very closes friends call her "Fiona" because of her personality. She has a son who is 12 years old. He goes to the local school. Since she was 16, Fabi has sold clothing for men and women. She sold this clothing by foot, and she says that she ran around the streets of the town with the clothing on a dolly to display all of her merchandise to potential clients.
The success of her efforts, combined with loans, has been such that she has established a clothing store located in the town center, displaying the clothing on mannequins and hangers.
Once every month, Fabi goes to purchase clothing of different styles, colors and sizes for her clients. In this way she is always able to satisfy their demand. Three years ago she decided to begin selling toys as well, and she sells the most around Christmas and the Epiphany, and Children's Day.
For the past ten years she has lifted the curtain of the shop at 8 a.m., indicating that she is open for business. She closes at 2 in the afternoon in order to pick her son up and feed him lunch, then she returns at 4 p.m. with her son, and closes the store at 8 p.m.
"My business and my tireless work have enabled me to give my son the best, and have ensured that I don't need to depend on anybody. I feel useful, productive, and like a hard worker. I also have the support of my family." So says Fabi, who will invest this new loan in the purchase of pants, blouses, skirts, sweatshirts, shirts, dresses, shorts and socks for men and for women.
The entire loan group is grateful Visión F México and to Kiva for the loan.
*the photograph was taken in Fabi's store, she is wearing a purple shirt.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, skirts, sweatshirts, sweaters, dresses, shorts and socks.

loans.name: Clarisa

texts.en: Clarisa is 46 years old and married with 2 school aged children. She runs a sari-sari store (convenience store) at Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. Clarisa was able to start up her business with the support of Paglaum MPC. She's a microfinance member of the cooperative and receives various seminars on running retail business. Recently, she has taken a loan of PHP 20,000.00 to restock store with commodities like canned goods, noodles, milk, soy sauce and others.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, noodles, milk, and soy sauce

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora is a widow from Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She owns and manages her own food stall where she sells snacks and foods. She has local costumers and also provides catering services. This business helps her provides for the needs of her 16 children, all of adult age. Flora is thankful to Paglaum MPC who extends financial support to her business. Recently, she has taken a loan to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, flour, butter, milk, sugar, spices, condiments and others.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, flour, butter, milk, sugar, spices and condiments for her food stall

loans.name: Rollin Jan

texts.en: Rollin Jan is 18 years old from Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. He is currently enrolled at a university located on his place where he is pursuing a bachelors degree in Marine Transportation. He is the eldest son of farmer parents and he wants to bring his family out of poverty. With dedication to finish his studies, he always burn his night candle to get good grades. Rollin Jan has taken out a loan of PHP 15,000 from Paglaum MPC for to pay for tuition and other school expenses.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and other school expenses

loans.name: El Castillo 2 Group

texts.es:
La agricultura es la actividad principal en l región ya que es una de las que mayor producción de azúcar posee, el acceso a la comunidad es en trasporte personal o taxi colectivo, el agua que consumen los habitantes proviene de un nacimiento.

En la comunidad 12 personas formaron un grupo llamado “El Castillo 2” por ser el nombre de la comunidad, actualmente los doce integrantes del grupo son:

Rebeca - Panadería
Alicia - Venta De Plantas De Ornato
Laudelina -Antojitos
Hilaria, Margarita – Calzado Por Catalogo
Evarista – Pollo Y Chácharas 
Minerva, Heriberta - Refresco
Eduardo - Venta De Masa Y Maíz
Lidia, Lizeth -Repostería
Elodia – Tacos

Doña Evarista es una de las integrantes del grupo, tiene 48 años de edad eta casada con el señor Domingo con quien procreó dos hijas hoy en dia mayores de edad, trabajan en la capital y apoyan a sus padres desde hace 12 años Doña Evarista se ha dedicado a vender pollo en pie y destazado, para ofrecerle un buen servicio a sus clientes se levanta a las 5:00 am , prende la lumbre en el bracero, pone una cubeta de metal llena de agua hasta que hierve para poder matar los pollos, sumergirlos en la cubeta con agua y quitarle las plumas, los  aliña y están listos para su venta pues sus clientes comienzan a llegar a las 7 de la mañana, si después de que termino los pollos del día un cliente va en busca de pollo con gusto lo aliña y satisface la necesidad de su cliente.

Las ganancias obtenidas de su actividad y el sueldo de su esposo les han servido para dar educación a sus hijas, solventar los gastos de la casa y continuar con su actividad.

Doña Evarista comento que los días festivos que son celebrados en la comunidad ella vende pollos asados a la leña, de igual manera en todos santos prepara 20 kilos de  pasta de mole lista para disolver en el caldo de pollo y deleitarse.

Hace poco menos de 1 año su hija mayor vino de visita y le trajo, moños, coleteros, donas, pinzas, pasadores, tines, licras, pantaletas y trusas para niños de tal manera que inicio una nueva actividad y  desde entonces cada mes le deposita a su hija para que le compre más mercancía.

“soy feliz con mis pequeños negocios, con mi familia por siempre apoyarme”, en esta ocasión el préstamo le será de utilidad para comprar  50 pollos alimento y malla para ampliar el corral donde los mantiene encerrados para que no escapen.

Las integrantes están contestas con los préstamos otorgados  y agradecen por la confianza brindada.

*La fotografía fue tomada en el patio de doña Margarita, detrás de las clientas a una distancia promedio de 20 metros se encuentra el nacimiento que les provee de agua para consumo, doña Evarista viste blusa roja y falda floreada.
texts.en:
Agriculture is the main business activity in this region, which is also one of the largest sugar producers. This community can be accessed by personal vehicles or shared taxis. The water that is used by its residents comes from a spring.

Twelve people from this community have formed a group called “El Castillo 2”, which is also the name of their community. There are currently 12 members in the group:
• Rebeca has a bakery.
• Alicia sells ornamental plants.
• Laudelina sells snacks.
• Hilaria and Margarita sell shoes through catalogs.
• Evarista sells chicken and trinkets.
• Minivera and Heriberta sell soft drinks.
• Eduardo sells cornmeal and corn.
• Lidia and Lizeth sell desserts.
• Elodia sells tacos.

Doña Evarista is one of the members of the group. She is 48 years old and married to Sr. Domingo. They have two daughters who are now grown and work in the capital in order to support them. For the past 12 years, Doña Evarista has been selling live and butchered chickens. In order to provide good service to her customers, she wakes up at 5:00 A.M. in order to light the fire pit and start boiling a metal pot full of water for processing chickens. The chickens are submerged into the hot water so that the feathers can be removed. Once the chickens are dressed, they are prepared for sale for her customers who begin arriving at her place at 7:00 A.M. When she finishes dressing chickens at the end of the day, there is always a customer who enjoys her product so she is always willing to satisfy the needs of that customer.

Her profits from this business, along with her husband’s salary, is how she was able to provide an education for her daughters, pay for her household expenses, and continue in her work. Doña Evarista says that the festival days celebrated in her community is when she sells fire roasted chickens. On those same days she prepares 20 kilos of mole paste, which can be dissolved in a pot of delicious chicken soup.

A little less than a year ago, one of her grown daughters came to visit her and brought back bows, hair pins, scrunchies, hairpins, leggings, and underwear for women and children. This allowed her to start another business. Since then, she has assigned her daughter the task of buying more merchandise each month.

“I am happy with my small businesses because I am always able to support my family.” On this occasion, Evarista’s loan will be used to buy 50 chickens, feed, and wire mesh for expanding the pen where the animals are kept so that they don’t escape.

The members are pleased with the loans that have been issued and appreciate the trust that has been placed in them. *The photograph was taken in Doña Margarita’s yard, which is about 20 meters away from the spring that supplies the community with drinking water. Doña Evarista is shown wearing a red blouse and a floral skirt.

loans.use: to buy 50 chickens, poultry feed, and wire mesh.

location.town: Tembladeras del castillo, Acatlan de Perez Figuero

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, con los financiamientos mantiene la fuente de ingresos en el mercado, su tortillería mantiene clientes satisfechos y junto a su familia vive en mejores condiciones.
Nuevamente hace la solicitud de un crédito para comprar maíz, leña y cal para continuar trabajando en la venta de totillas, la finalidad que tiene María es tener ingresos para subsistir y cancelar la nueva deuda.
texts.en:
With this funding, María maintains her source of income in the market, and her tortilla stand keeps its clients satisfied. Along with her family, she lives in better conditions.

She is requesting a loan again to buy corn, firewood, and lime to continue working in tortilla sales. María’s goal is to have income to live on and to pay off the new debt.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, and lime to continue working in tortilla sales.

loans.name: Quitero

texts.en: Quitero is 80 years old. He is a widow from Lamao, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. He has 2 adult aged children who have family of their own. Because Quitero wants to live comfortably in his house, he wants to make major renovations on his dwellings. He asks for financial assistance from Paglaum MPC in the amount of PHP 25,000.00 to purchase plywood, sticks, nails and galvanized iron sheets for house renovation.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, sticks, nails and galvanized iron sheets for house renovation

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en: As an active member of Paglaum MPC who learns from various trainings the coop had offered, Marilou has ventured into a new business that will create job opportunity as well as augment her monthly income. Marilou is a businesswoman who manages a farm, sari-sari store (convenience store) and now, a boarding house. To finance for the repair of her business venture, she has taken a loan of PHP 13,000.00 to purchase bags of cements, plywood, nails for boarding house repair.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement, plywood, nails for boarding house repair

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria es una joven de 25 años de edad, residente del municipio de Chigorodó, una zona afectada por la pobreza, donde escasean las oportunidades, pero llena de personas talentosas que con emprendimiento e ideas de trabajo quieren cambiarle la cara al municipio.

Victoria es madre de una pequeña de 4 años y es esa criatura la que la motiva a salir a delante y hacer de su salón de belleza un éxito total en su municipio.

Ella no se quiere dejar vencer por las adversidades, por la falta de recursos, por las necesidades, por el contrario busca alternativas y ayudas para salir adelante, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo con el que comprara una silla de motilar e insumos como tinturas y tratamientos para mejorar su negocio y hacerlo ver más atractivo para sus clientes, también desea comprar cabello natural ya que las extensiones de pelo es un producto muy solicitado en está zona.
texts.en:
Victoria is a young women who is 25 years old. She lives in the municipality of Chigorodó, which is a zone affected by poverty and where there are few opportunities. But, it is full of talented people who are entrepreneurial and have ideas for work who want to change the face of the municipality.

Victoria is a mother to a small child who is 4 years old. This little one motivates her to get ahead in life and make her beauty salon a total success in her municipality.

She does want to be overcome by adversities, a lack of resources, or by necessities. On the contrary; she is looking for alternatives and help to get ahead. For this reason, she wants to request a loan which she will use to buy a hairdressing chair and supplies, such as dyes and hair treatments, to improve her business and make it more attractive to her customers. Also, she wishes to buy natural hair since hair extensions are a product that is requested a lot in this area.

loans.use: to buy a chair to do haircuts and products to do hair treatments and coloring.

loans.name: Anacely

texts.es:
Anacely es una mujer de 53 años de edad que atiende un negocio de tienda de abarrotes, un negocio ubicado en Puerto Boyacá, una zona rural donde se ven pocos negocios de estos.

Junto a Anacely esta su adoración, su pequeña nieta que tanto ama y que ha criado con mucho gusto.

La empresaria quiere constituir un negocio completo, quiere que sus vecinos encuentren en su tienda todo producto de primera necesidad, ya que muchos de ellos deben realizar un largo desplazamiento para encontrar ciertos productos.

En base a su deseo y a querer tener un negocio con un surtido completo, Anacely quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de abarrotes, productos de aseo personal, granos, principalmente; arroz, fríjol, plátano, yuca, tomates, etc., que son los productos que más piden en su tienda.

El sueño es tener un mini-mercado y poder heredar el negocio a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Anacely is a 53-year-old woman who attends to a grocery store business. The business is located in Puerto Boyacá, a rural area where there are few business like these.

Next to Anacely is her adoration, her small granddaughter whom she loves very much and has raised with pleasure.

This entrepreneur wants to set up a complete business. She wants her neighbors to be able to find every type of basic necessity in her store, since many of them have to make a long commute to find certain products.

Based on her desire and wish to have a business with a complete inventory, Anacely wants to request a loan in order to buy groceries, personal cleansing products, grains (mainly rice), beans, bananas, yuca, tomatoes, etc. which are the products most asked for in her store.

Her dream is to have a mini-market and be able to bequeath the business to her family.

loans.use: to buy groceries, personal cleansing products, grains (mainly rice), beans, bananas, yuca, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María es de esas mujeres luchadoras, que no tienen límite de edad, ella se dedica a la confección una actividad que desempeña desde el año 1985 y con la cual sostiene su hogar. 

Ella es separara, trabaja de lunes a sábado entre 6 y 8 horas todo depende del estado de salud en que se encuentre.

Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de vida de su hogar, vivir una vejez tranquila y digna, sin pasar necesidades, y ella a pesar de una incapacidad, de la falta de recursos ella sigue en pie con su profesión, pagando sus cuentas, bordando cada prenda por un alimento, por vivir bien, por superarse y no dejarse vencer de la edad.

Para mejorar su producción  tener maquinaria que trabaja más ágilmente, María quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de una máquina de confección más moderna y tela.
texts.en:
María is one of those women who are determined, who are not limited by their age. She works as a seamstress, which she has been doing since 1985 and is how she maintains her home.

She is different. She works from Monday to Saturday between 6 and 8 hours, depending on the status of her health she finds herself in.

Her dream is to improve her living conditions in her home, and to live to an old age calm and dignified without giving up any necessities. In spite of a handicap, due to lack of resources, she continues on her feet working, paying her bills, and embroidering each garment for food, to live well, to get ahead, and to not give in to old age.

In order to improve her production she needs a sewing machine that works more quickly. Maria wants to request economic support to buy a more modern sewing machine and cloth.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA GENERACION III, la socia  continua con su negocio de restaurant, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como aceite, arroz entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the communal bank “Nueva Generacion III.” The member is continuing her restaurant business. She has been in this business for some time, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. The member is a responsible person. She has been in this business for some time, and it is going well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.

The member is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as oil and rice, among others.

The member is grateful for the loan she has been granted, and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as oil and rice, among others.

loans.name: Allahdari Group

texts.fr: Kariadjatou, est une femme âgée de 35 ans mariée mère de 4 enfants. Elle exerce son activité de vente d’eau et du bon jus depuis 10 ans. Elle est dynamique, battante. Son atout c’est qu’elle fait bien du bon jus naturelle et variée ; sa stratégie c’est sa qualité, sa propriété du lieu de commerce. Elle veut le prêt pour s’acheter les ingrédients pour le jus à 25 000f ; le sucre à 67 500 3 sacs. L’eau à 50 000 f et 7 500 le gaz pour la préparation.L’utilité du prêt c’est de s’approvisionner en ingrédients suffisant afin de renforcer son activité. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt 11 fois et à rembourser aux dates prévues.
texts.en:
Kariadjatou is 35 years old, married, and the mother of four children. She has been selling water and juice for 10 years. She is dynamic and a fighter. Her advantage is that she makes good natural juice in a number of flavors. Her strategy involves quality and a clean workplace.

She would like a loan to buy juice ingredients for 25,000F, three bags of sugar for 67,500F, water for 50,000F, and gas for 7,500F. She will use the loan to buy enough ingredients to bolster her business. She has already received and repaid 11 loans by their due date.

loans.use: buy juice ingredients for 25,000F, three bags of sugar for 67,500F, water for 50,000F, and gas for 7,500F.

loans.name: Jorge Ignacio

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre separado de 55 años de edad que trabaja realizando calzado para empresas, una actividad que realiza a terceros, pero que hoy quiere realizar independientemente, por ello solicita tu apoyo para la compra de la materiales con los que iniciara a fabricar sandalias por su cuenta, que es el calzado de mayor venta en el momento debido a su comodidad y bajo costo.

Jorge siempre ha tenido el sueño de producir su propio calzado, hoy está abierta la oportunidad de hacerlo, por ello les pide que lo ayuden a lograr un sueño y que está oportunidad sea el comienzo de un cambio radical en su vida, que tenga trabajo constante y que los ingresos le permitan mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y apoyar incondicionalmente a su hija que tiene 15 años de edad.
texts.en:
Jorge is a divorced man who is 55 years old. He works making footwear for businesses, which is an activity he carries out as a third party but that today he wants to carry out independently. For this reason, he is requesting your support to buy materials which he will use to begin to manufacture sandals on his own, which is the footwear with the highest sales at the moment due to their comfort and low cost.

Jorge has always had the dream to produce his own footwear. Today, the opportunity to do this is open, which is why he is asking for support to help achieve his dream and so that this opportunity becomes a start to a radical change in his life. He is hoping that he constantly has work to do, his income allows him to improve the quality of his life and his family, and that he can unconditionally support his daughter who is 15 years old.

loans.use: to buy materials to begin to sell his own line of shoes, considering that before he has worked as an intermediary.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy 240 fish.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene, es casado, vive únicamente con su pareja, sus hijos ya tienen su propio hogar, trabaja en la agricultura, el oficio lo aprendió de sus padres, a muy corta edad se independizo, inicio cultivando frijol en una manzana de tierra, actualmente también cultiva caña de azúcar en cuatro manzanas y maíz en dos manzanas de tierra, de esta manera tiene los recursos necesarios para costear los gastos de su hogar.
Solicita un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar obreros, dará un mejor desarrollo a sus cultivos y aumentara la productividad de su negocio, espera cosechar mayor cantidad de caña de azúcar y granos básicos para atender las demandas de sus clientes y tener mejores ganancias con las que cancelara su deuda y cubrirá las necesidades de su hogar.
Sus aspiraciones son ampliar el área de cultivo, tener estabilidad financiera y lograr trabajar con dinero propio.
texts.en:
Rene is married and lives with only his partner. His children already have their own homes. He works in agriculture, and he learned the trade from his parents. He became independent at a very early age. He started growing beans on one manzana [about 1.736 acres] of land. Currently, he also grows sugarcane on four manzanas of land, and corn on two manzanas of land. In this way, he has the necessary resources to afford household expenses.

He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and pay workers. This will develop his crops better and increase the productivity of his business. He hopes to harvest a greater quantity of sugarcane and staple grains, to take care of his customers’ demands, and to have better profits, with which he will pay off his debt and cover the necessities of his home.

His aspirations are to expand his range of crops, to have financial stability, and to be able to work with his own money.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay workers.  It will develop his crops better and increase the productivity of his business.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltera y vive en casa con sus padres.

Sonia, se dedica a vender ropa de manera ambulante, antes le ayudaba a una prima a vender, pero desde hace un año decidió independizarse, porque vio que este negocio generaba buenos ingresos.

Sonia, necesita el crédito para comprar más ropa y así poder ampliar más su negocio, específicamente  comprará 2 docenas de pantalones para caballero, 2 docenas de pantalones para dama, 1 docena de camisas y 1 docena de blusas.

El sueño de Sonia, es obtener un crédito más grande y poder mejorar la vivienda de sus padres y mejorar su negocio para obtener mejores ingresos y darle mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
33-year-old Sonia has a high school education, is single and lives with her parents. 

Sonia sells clothes on the street. She used to help a cousin, but decided to go independent one year ago, as she saw that this business can provide a good income.

Sonia needs this loan to buy clothes to expand her business. Specifically, she will buy two dozen pants for men, two dozen pants for women, one dozen shirts, and one dozen blouses. 

Sonia's dreams are to obtain a larger loan and improve her parents' house, as well as to obtain a higher income and provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy two dozen pants for men, two dozen pants for women, one dozen shirts and one dozen blouses.

loans.name: Gulruhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсору 31 лет. Она семейная женщина. Мух находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. У мужа свой есть свой бизнес, у Гулрухсор тоже есть свой бизнес. Гулрухсор 20 лет занимается выпечкой, лепешки, самбусы и манту.  Она сама печет и продает клиентам. Ей нравится зарабатывать честно нажитым трудом. Гулрухсор решила расширить деятельность и увеличить доход. И по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Гулрухсор надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Gulruhsor is 31.  She has a family of her own, and her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.  Her husband has his own business, and Gulruhsor has her own business too.  For 20 years, she's made baked goods, such as flatbread, sambusas, and mantu, baking them herself and selling them to customers.  She enjoys earning her living through honest labor.    

Gulruhsor has decided to expand her business and increase her income.  And with this reason in mind, she's requested a loan.  Gulruhsor is counting on your support.

loans.use: expand her business and increase her income

loans.name: Washington

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA GENERACION III, el socio  continua  dedicándose a su negocio de restaurant, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio es una persona responsable, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de eta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de las cuotas.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite, carnes, arroz entre otros.
texts.en: The member belongs to the Nueva Generacion III communal bank. He continues to work at his restaurant business. The member has had this business for quite some time and does well thanks to the effort he puts into it every day. He is a responsible person that wishes to continue working to be able to support his family. The member is thankful for the loan received and promises to pay it back on time. He requested the loan to buy supplies such as oil, meat and rice, among others.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as oil, meat and rice, among others.

loans.name: María Celestina

texts.es:
María, de 57 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está casada y es madre de 5 hijos, tres de ellos están en los Estados Unidos y son independientes pero ayudan a sus padres y los otros dos están en casa.

María, se dedica a la elaboración de tamales y pan, los cuales sale a vender en su comunidad y lo demás lo vende en su casa, ella se dedica a este negocio desde hace 10 años, pero también tiene ingresos adicionales de la venta de queso y leche; su esposo se dedica a la ganadería y la realiza con la ayuda de sus dos hijos.

María, invertirá el crédito para comprar materiales para cercar el lugar donde tiene el ganado para darle más seguridad, también comprará alimentación para su ganado, para la producción de leche y así obtener mejores ingresos.
 
El sueño de María, en un futuro quiere obtener un crédito más grande para comprar más ganado y hacer más grande su negocio y de esta manera obtener mejores ingresos, para darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Fifty-seven year old María studied through second grade and is a married mother of five children, three of whom are in the United States and are independent but help their parents, and the other two live in the family home. 

María makes tamales and bread, which she sells in her community, and the rest she sells from her home.  She has been engaged in this business for ten years, and also makes income from selling cheese and milk. Her busband works with livestock, a business that he runs with his two children.

Maria will invest this loan in the purchase of of materials to fence in the area, to purchase feed for her livestock, and to produce milk and thus earn better income.   

Maria's dream in the future is to get a larger loan in order to be able to purchase more livestock and expand her business and therefore make more income in order to be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase materials to fence in the area where she keeps livestock in order to give them more security, and also to purchase feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Chamen

texts.en: Chamen is a married man. He has one child. He describes himself to be reliable. He operates a retail business where he sells water. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a residential area and his primary customers are locals. He will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy another cart for transporting water. He hopes that in the future, he will have a comfortable life. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy another cart for transporting water.

loans.name: Reina Idalia

texts.es:
Reina, de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casada, es madre de 3 hijos, el mayor tiene 18 años de edad, el otro tiene 12 años de edad y el último tiene 2 años de edad.

Reina, se dedica a los oficios del hogar y también a la venta de ropa junto a su esposo, la cual tiene en su casa, ella se dedica a este trabajo desde hace 4 años, al principio ella le ayudaba a una tía y cuando vio que generaba buenos ingresos, decidió independizarse.

Reina, necesita el crédito para comprar 2 docenas de pantalón para hombre, 2 docenas de pantalón para dama, 2 docenas de blusas, 3 docenas de sandalias para dama y niñas y 3 docenas de calcetines para caballero. 

El sueño de Reina, es en un futuro obtener un crédito más grande, para alquilar un local en la ciudad y trabajar todo el día, para obtener mejores ganancias y brindar a su familia mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
41 year-old Reina studied until high school, is married, and is the mother of three children; the eldest whom is 18 years old, the other whom is 12, and the youngest whom is 2.  

Reina focuses on running the household and also on selling clothing with her husband, which they keep in their house. She has been doing this work for four years.  At first she helped an aunt, and when she saw that she made good income, she decided to go out on her own.

Reina needs the loan in order to purchase two dozen pairs of men's pants, two dozen pair of women's pants, two dozen blouses, three dozen women's and girl's sandals, and three dozen men's socks. 

Reina's dream is to have a larger loan in the future in order to rent a business space in the city and work every day in order to make better income and offer a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase two dozen pairs of men's pants, two dozen pairs of women's pants, two dozen blouses, three dozen women's and girl's sandals, and three dozen men's socks.

loans.name: Gatarakwa Great Vision Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand holding a passbook (in the middle) is Leah. She is 35 years old, married and blessed with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa so as to benefit from the trainings, especially enterprise development.

She practices mixed farming; crops such as maize, beans and vegetables and poultry farming. She also sells secondhand clothes so as to supplement her income. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy more poultry and fertilizers; hence boosting poultry and crop farming production for increased income. She plans to use the profits to expand her clothes selling business and also renovate her family house.

Leah is grateful to Kiva and her lenders for the financial support. She promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: To buy more poultry and fertilizer; hence boosting farming production for increased profits to expand her clothes selling business and renovate her family house.

loans.name: Trust And Obey Group

texts.en:
Rose is 44 years old and married with two children. She lives in Chorkor in the greater-Accra region of Ghana. Rose is a member of the group called Trust and Obey. She is the woman pictured standing to the far left in the photo.

The group has been in business for the past decade, and Rose and all her group mates have been trained in business and health. Rose enjoys doing her business and hopes to grow the business with the proceeds that she makes. She and her group members are requesting a loan of GHS 3,000. Rose’s portion of the loan is GHS 1,000, which she will use to buy more ladies' dresses to meet her customers' demand in order to grow her business.

Rose hopes to repay this loan from the income she will make from her business.

loans.use: to buy more ladies' dresses to meet her customers' demand in order to grow her business.

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es:
Él es Gonzalo es un hombre de 42 años de edad, una persona diferente, un hombre que aprendió que quejarse no es la solución, por el contrario tomó su vehículo, compro un surtido de frutas y verduras y salió a la calle  a buscar un futuro prometedor para su familia que la conforma su pareja y sus 4 hijos de 7, 16, 12 y 4 años de edad.

Gonzalo  tiene un sueño de comprar una vivienda y pagar la educación de sus muchachos, por ello quiere trabajar, por ello está dispuesto a doblar su turno, y ahora quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de surtido de frutas y verduras.

Apoya a este gran hombre, que no se detiene ante ninguna dificultad para lograr un buen futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
This is Gonzalo, a 42-year-old man. He is a different kind of individual because he learned that complaining is not the solution. Gonzalo acquired a vehicle and bought an assortment of fruits and vegetables before taking to the streets in search of a promising future for his family. He and his partner have four children (ages 7, 16, 12, and 4).

Gonzalo’s dream is to buy a house and pay for his children’s education. He works for this reason. Gonzalo is willing to double his turnover, so now he is requesting financial support in order to buy a stock of fruits and vegetables.

Support this great man who is not deterred by difficulty so that he can achieve a good future for his family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as cassava, potatoes, bananas, cilantro, tomatoes, carrots, and other produce.

loans.name: Kiriri Kuku Kienyeji Self Help Group

texts.en:
The person raising his hand in the photo is James, a member of Kiriri Kuku Kienyeji Self Help Group. He is 66 years old and married with eight children. He joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2013.

James does poultry and dairy farming. With the training he got from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa, he has been able to commercialize his farming business and now is able to get more profits, unlike before. He is borrowing a Kiva loan to purchase wire mesh and add more chickens. This will improve his income; hence he will be in a position to educate his children and provide for his family needs.

He is grateful to Kiva and its lenders for their support and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to purchase wire mesh and add more chickens. This will improve his income; hence he will be in a position to educate his children and provide for his family needs.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 58 years old, married and blessed with six children. He joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2014 so as to benefit from the trainings, especially enterprise development.

Peter is a vegetable farmer of potatoes and kale. He also operates a motorbike (bodaboda) to supplement his income. He is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy certified seeds and fertilizer so as to boost his farming production. He hopes this will increase his income and he intends to use the profits to buy a calf to diversify his farming.

Peter is grateful to Kiva and its lenders and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: To buy certified seeds and fertilizer so as to boost his farming for increased income and profits to enable him to buy a calf

loans.name: Daniel Alberto

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven de 20 años de edad, luchador, verraco, alentado, emprendedor, una persona que quiere tomar su futuro en sus manos y luchar por recompensar a su amada madre si quiere con algo, por la excelente educación, crianza y amor que le ha dado a lo largo de su vida.

Este joven se dedica a la cría de cerdos y teneros, una actividad que aprendió de sus padres y que empezó hace poco.

El sueño de Daniel es poder pagarse sus estudios, comprar una vivienda, tener a su madre viviendo como una reina y a pesar que es tan nuevo en la profesión tiene el apoyo incondicional de sus padres que lo guiaran por un buen camino.

Con la intención de mejorar su negocio, tener animales para desarrollar su profesión, postularse como un fuerte competidor, Daniel quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una cerda de cría, lechones, terneros y alimento de levante.

Dicho préstamo le brindara las herramientas necesarias a este joven empresario para trabajar.
texts.en:
Daniel is a young man 20 years of age; a fighter who is plucky, bright and enterprising. He wants to take his future into his own hands and fight to make sure his mother lacks for nothing and to pay her back for the excellent education, upbringing and love she has given him throughout his life.

Daniel breeds pigs and calves, a business he learnt from his parents and that he only started recently.

Daniel's dream is to be able to pay for his studies, buy a house and have his mother living like a queen. Despite being very new to the profession, he has the unconditional support of his parents who are guiding him every step of the way.

In order to improve his business and have livestock with which he can build his business to position himself as a strong competitor in the sector, Daniel is requesting a loan to buy a breeding sow, piglets, calves and food to rear them.

This loan would give this young business owner the tools he needs for his work.

loans.use: to buy a breeding sow, piglets, calves and food for rearing them.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase a bag of maize.

loans.name: Wabepa Farmers Group

texts.en:
The person raising his hand in the photo is called Joseph. He is 65 years old, married and the father of six children. He joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2014. He has successfully been trained in enterprise development and financial management, which has enabled him to utilize these skills to run his farming business to profitability.

His main economic activity is coffee farming and he has applied for a Kiva loan to enable him to improve on his vegetable farming. The income from his businesses will enable him to pay school fees for his children.

He is grateful to Kiva and its lenders and he promises to repay his loan promptly.

loans.use: To increase his vegetable farming and earn him more income to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Benigna

texts.en: Benigna lives in Getafe, Bohol. She is married and her husband is a carpenter. Benigna is dependent on her hog-raising business for a living. She started raising hogs almost 20 years ago and she earns PHP 3,000 per month. She is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy feed for swine and feed for piglets. She dreams of having a prosperous business so she can continue sending her children to school. They are ages 12 and 18.

loans.use: to buy feed for swine and feed for piglets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of milk to sell and animal feed for her dairy cows so as to get more milk to sell.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is the name of the lady in the photo. She is married and the mother of four children. Her economic activity is farming maize, beans and potatoes. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in March 2013 and has received training in enterprise management and financial planning. This has equipped her with the skills to effectively run her farming business. Emily requires a loan in order to purchase certified seeds and fertilizer. She believes this will increase her proceeds, thus boosting her income. She will therefore be able to improve the overall living standards of her family, such as medical care.

She is grateful to Kiva and its lenders and promises to make established payments.

loans.use: to purchase certified seeds and fertilizer. She believes this will increase her proceeds, thus boosting her income.

loans.name: Kazi Group

texts.fr: Contents de l'appui de PAIDEK dans le domaine rizicole, les membres du groupe KAZI espère accroitre leurs productions, diversifier les semences, scolariser leurs enfants et équiper leurs maisons. Ils ont une expérience de six ans dans l'activité; ils s'y sont engagés grâce à l'encouragement de leurs parents et familiers. La riziculture constitue pour eux un moyen de gagner leur vie car à la dernière saison ils ont réuni après récolte une somme de mille vingt cinq dollars pour les charges de cinq cent dollars, d'où un résultat de cinq cent vingt-cinq dollars. Le groupe est présidé par Emile, qui sur la photo tient un carnet rose.
texts.en:
Happy with PAIDEK's support of rice farmers, the members of the Kazi group are hoping to increase their production, to diversify their seed mix, to educate their children and to equip their homes. 

They have 6 years experience in this line of work; they were encouraged to get into farming by their relatives and friends. Rice farming is a way for them to earn a living and last season they made $1,025 with a $500 investment, so a profit of $525. 

The group is led by Emile, the man holding the pink booklet in the picture.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and phytosanitary products and to pay wages for weeding etc.

loans.name: Marivel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA GENERACION III, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia sigue con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continúa vendiendo diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, leche, golosinas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the Communal Bank “Nueva Generación III” (New Generation 3). The bank is located in Cusco Province.

The borrower continues to manage a grocery store. She is a responsible and diligent individual. The borrower continues to sell different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, and other items to all of her customers who request them. She wants to keep working so that she can continue to support her family.

The borrower is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, milk, snack foods, and other items. She appreciates the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, milk, snack foods, and other items.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel comes from a remote village in Central Kenya. He is single but comes from a family of seven siblings where he is the fifth born. He practices lumbering, dairy and horticultural farming. He also makes extra income from offering transportation services to the public using his motorcycle.

Daniel is seeking a loan to buy more dairy goats. He has invested capital into this venture in terms of animal housing and growing of fodder. He needs help to buy the actual assets, the goats.
The goats will provide him with milk and kids that will improve his income and capital base respectively. Through your investment, Daniel will earn more money and be in a position to secure bigger financial services from formal financial institutions.

loans.use: to buy dairy goats

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: resupply with cassava flour and culinary oils

loans.name: Willy

texts.en:
Willy is a smallholder farmer based in Central Kenya, where agriculture is the main economic activity of the populace. His main source of income is milk. Julius aspires to grow his business, make a better income and take good care of his family.

One way that Julius can improve his business is by ensuring his cows are more productive. He is seeking a loan to buy a machine that will turn hay into chaff, for feeding his livestock. Cows generally enjoy chaff because it is cleanly and evenly cut, free of dust, and has a fresh aroma. Having a chaff cutter will make Willy's work of handling fodder in bulk very easy. Also, his livestock will grow healthier and more productive because it is easier to mix a balanced ration if the fodder is in chaff form.

loans.use: to buy a chaff cutter and cereals.

loans.name: Wendkato Group

texts.fr: Joséphine, âgée de 35 ans mariée mère de 4 enfants. Elle exerce son activité depuis 3 ans. Ce qui fait marcher son activité ce sont : son emplacement de lieu de vente de fruit ; l’accueil des clients, le respect et la qualité des marchandises. Elle  veut le prêt pour s’acheter de la banane et avocat à 150 000 et le reste de 50 000  dans l’achat d’autres fruits. L’utilité  du prêt c’est de s’approvisionner en quantité et qualité suffisante afin de renforcer son activité. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt 2 fois et à rembourser aux dates prévues.
texts.en:
Josephine is the 35-year-old married mother of four children. She has been running a business for the past three years.

The factors that make her business prosper are: its location for fruit sales; the welcoming of customers, respect for and the quality of merchandise.

She wants the loan to buy 150,000 francs' worth of bananas and avocados and use the remaining 50,000 francs to purchase other fruits.

The loan is useful to stock up in sufficient quantity and quality so she can strengthen her activity. She has already been granted two loans and repaid them on time.

loans.use: buy 150,000 francs' worth of bananas and avocados, and use the remaining 50,000 francs to purchase other fruits

loans.name: Mapambazuko Group

texts.fr: Les parents de Dieu merci ont formé tous leurs enfants à la culture du riz. Il se plait de cette activité non seulement du fait que tout le village s'y intéresse mais surtout parce qu'elle lui a permis de réaliser certaines de ses projets (dot, mariage,...). Il reconnaît cependant que cette culture exige un entretien régulier et assez d'eau pour immerger les plants. Il souhaite pour cette saison réaliser une grande production. Sur photo, Dieu merci tient un carnet rose.
texts.en: Dieu merci's parents taught all of their children to farm rice. He likes this activity, not only because the whole village practices it, but primarily because it has enabled him to complete several personal projects (for instance, to pay a dowry and get married). He realises, however, that his crops need regular maintenance and enough water in which to submerge the plants. He hopes to have a large harvest this season. Dieu merci is the man holding the pink booklet in the picture.

loans.use: to buy phytosanitary products and chemical fertilsers, and to pay wages for weeding, cutting and harvesting.

loans.name: Jembe Mbele Group

texts.fr: c'est en 2002 que la plupart de membres du groupe JEMBE MBELE se sont lancés dans la riziculture de par l'apprentissage qu'ils ont reçu de leurs parents. ce qui leur plait, ce sont les réalisations de cette activité qui par un exemple concret de la saison dernière, a permis au groupe couvrir leurs charges et de réaliser un résultat positif. Ils souhaitent mettre en œuvre certaines stratégies afin d'accroitre leurs productions, diversifier après un certain temps leurs semences , scolariser leurs enfants, améliorer leur habitat et se procurer certains appareils électroménagers. Le groupe est chapeauté par Makengesheko qui, sur photo tient un carnet rose.
texts.en:
It was in 2002 that most of the JEMBE MBELE group members started rice culture after receiving training from their parents. They appreciate the outcomes of this activity; to give a concrete example from last season, it permitted the group to cover their expenses and realise a net benefit.
They wish to put certain strategies in place in order to increase their production, after some time diversify their crops, send their children to school, improve their living conditions and purchase certain household electrical appliances. The group is led by Makengesheko who holds a pink booklet on the photo.

loans.use: to pay for weeding, buy fertiliser and crop protection products.

loans.name: Sebeke-Ton Group

texts.fr: SEKOU  est  celui  qui  porte  le  chapeau  rouge  sur  la  photo.  Il  est  père de  famille  âge  de  49  ans. Dans  son  domicile  il  a  4  enfants en  charge    son  activité  principale  est  l’agriculture,  maintenant  il  veut  cultive  le  casâmes.  IL  a  3  enfants  scolarise ;  lui-même   n’a  pas  été   à l’école ; mais  il  est  courageux  dans  son  activité.  Sa  femme  est  ménagère,  elle  aide  son  mari  dans   son  activité  agricole.  Son  lieu  de  travail   est     près   de  son  village. Si  l’hivernage  se  passe  dans  les  condition  normales  il  croit  avoir  500 000FCFA comme bénéfice. Avec  l’investissement  de son prêt    qu’il  a  emprunté  avec  le RMCR. Il a fait  recourt  au  RMCR  pour  entretenir  son champs  . Il  souhaite  acheter  un  terrain  à titre d’habitation.
texts.en:
Sekou is the man wearing the red hat in the photo. He is a 49 year old father. At home, he takes care of four children. His main activity is agriculture, now he wants to grow sesame. He has three children who attend school; he himself had never been to school, but he is courageous in his activity. His wife is a housewife, she helps her husband in his agricultural activity.
His workplace is near his village. If the rainy season goes according to normal conditions, he believes that he will earn 500 000 FCFA by investing this loan from RMCR. He sollicited RMCR in order to maintain his field. He wishes to purchase a plot of land to live on.

loans.use: to maintain his sesame field.

loans.name: Maminirina Zoliarisoa

texts.fr:
Maminirina est une femme travailleuse de 39 ans. Elle est mariée et son mari travaille en tant que maçon tâcheron. Ils ont ensemble trois enfants  de 6, 9, et 13 ans et qui sont tous scolarisés dans des écoles privées. Pour aider son mari à entretenir sa famille, elle dirige un petit magasin général depuis 2002 à part son travail de secrétariat à mi temps dans le bureau de son quartier (Fokontany). Elle demande un crédit afin de pouvoir développer son activité. C'est à dire le prêt va lui permettre de renforcer son fonds de roulement, augmenter et diversifier les quantités des marchandises.
La famille a déjà actuellement sa propre petite maison et Maminirina  s'efforce d'épargner beaucoup plus pour pouvoir réaliser de l'extension un peu plus tard.
texts.en:
Maminirina is a working woman of 39 years of age. She is married and her husband does piece work as a mason. The couple have 3 children aged 6, 9 and 13, all of whom go to private school. 

In order to be able to support her husband with the family's maintenance, Maminirina has been running a general store since 2002, in addition to her job as part-time secretary in an office in her district (Fokontany). She is requesting a loan in order to expand her business; this loan will reinforce her working capital and allow her to increase and diversify the products she offers. 

The family already have their own little house and Maminirina is trying to save a lot more money in order to build an extension in the near future.

loans.use: to buy maize, bags of rice, sugar, cooking oil, dried fish and pistachios.

loans.name: Vahiniaina Njara Tiana

texts.fr:
Vahiniaina est jeune une femme très simple mais débrouillarde de 27 ans. Elle est mariée et son mari est pâtissier salarié. Ils ont ensemble deux adorables petits enfants de 4 et 2 ans. L'ainé est en grande section dans une école privée.
Elle travaillait en tant que serveuse dans un petit restaurant avant son mariage. Et depuis lors, pour pouvoir s'occuper de ses enfants, elle choisissait travailler à la maison. Son mari lui apprenait la pâtisserie et elle  fabrique des petits fours et des bonbons en sésame et elle les livre chez des petits commerçants.
Son objectif est de pouvoir offrir un jour un salon de thé (avec pâtisserie et glacier) un jour qu'elle et son mari dirigeront ensemble.
texts.en:
Vahiniaina is a young, 27-year-old woman who is straightforward but resourceful. She is married and her husband works as a baker. The couple have 2 adorable small children aged 4 and 2. The eldest is in his last year of primary school in a private school.

Vahiniaina worked as a waitress in a small restaurant before her marriage. Since then, in order to be able to look after her children, she has chosen to work at home. Her husband taught her to bake and she now makes cookies and sesame sweets which she then delivers to small retailers.

Her aim is one day to be able to open a café (selling cakes and ice cream) which she and her husband will run together.

loans.use: to buy 150 kilos of sesame.

loans.name: Cecilia De La Paz

texts.es:
Cecilia tiene como actividad económica la venta de pupusas, panes con pollo y jugos, elabora la venta de sus productos todos los días, en los alrededores hay negocios de talleres y el personal que labora ahí son sus principales clientes. Es una mujer divorciada y tiene dos hijos a los cuales debe sacar adelante.
Siente la necesidad de mejorar su negocio por lo que solicita un crédito en Padecomsm, lo invertirá en la compra de una plancha para elaborar pupusas, le dará oportunidad de aumentar su productividad, mejorar la vistosidad del negocio y dar a sus clientes un buen servicio.
Los sueños de Cecilia son tener casa propia y así compartir una vida más confortable con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Cecilia's economic activity is selling pupusas, panes con pollo (warm chicken sandwiches), and juices. She makes and sells her products every day. Nearby there are workshops and the personnel that work in them are her main customers. She is divorced and she has two children whom she must get ahead.

She feels the need to improve her business and so she is asking for a loan from Padecomsm. She will invest it in buying a press to make pupusas. This will give her and opportunity to increase her productivity, improve the visibility of her business, and give her customers a good service.

Cecilia's dreams are to have her own home and share a more comfortable life with her children.

loans.use: to buy a press to make pupusas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, bread, snacks, detergents, soap, toothpaste, and other products to offer her customers.

loans.name: Martina Rosa

texts.es:
Martina es una sonriente mujer de 52 años de edad, ella es madre de familia, tiene dos princesas de 21 y 16 años de edad, es casada, tiene un hogar firme, estable y amoroso, donde trabaja muy fuerte al igual que su esposo para que nunca lleguen a pasar necesidades en su hogar.

Martina trabaja atendiendo una miscelánea, que es un negocio variado, donde ofrece productos como cosméticos, de papelería, productos de uso personal y poco a poco ha querido añadirle nuevos servicios. Tiene pensado comenzar ofertar servicios de copiado y vender productos varios como juguetes, alcancías, espejos, accesorios etc., por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para añadir estos nuevos servicios y productos a su almacén, con el monto solicitado comprara una fotocopiado multifuncional, y variedad de productos anteriormente mencionadas.
texts.en:
Martina is a smiling woman of 52 years old. She is a mother: she has two princesses aged 21 and 16. She is married and has a strong, stable and loving home; she and her husband work very hard to ensure that the household is never without necessities. 

Martina runs a general store: it offers a varierty of products, including cosmetics, stationery and products for personal use. Little by little, she has added new services and now plans to begin offering copy services, and selling different products such as toys, piggy banks, mirrors and accessories. She is therefore requesting a loan so that she can add these new services and products to her store. With the amount requested she will buy a multifunctional photocopier and a range of the aforementioned products.

loans.use: to buy a multifunction printer and other products, such as piggy banks, thermos flasks and toys.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a display case, (Roberval) weighing scales, bags of rice, table oils and cleaning products.

loans.name: Dani Maricruz

texts.es:
Dani continúa con su negocio de ferretería. El crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de material de construcción, como; estuco, cal, alambres, clavos, lija, etc. El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual. Su negocio continua generando buenas ventas, el boom de la construcción hace su negocio un éxito, “mi negocio está respondiendo a las necesidades de los vecinos que construyen sus casas y realizan arreglos, tenemos todo lo que necesitan…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es cuenta con ventas continuas, la desventaja es la falta de capital para abastecer el negocio continuamente, su sueño es ampliar su ferretería y ofrecer más productos, ella desea realizar la compra de material de construcción como; cemento, cables para electricidad, madera, etc. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que realiza esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Dani solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de construcción para abastecer su ferretería y cubrir la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Dani’s hardware business carries on. She invested the prior loan in the purchase of construction materials, such as plaster, lime, wire, nails, sandpaper, etc. Her payments were punctual. Her business continues generating good sales. The construction boom makes her business a success. "My business is responding to the needs of neighbors, who build their homes and perform fixes, we have everything that they need..." she says.

Her business' advantage is that sales continue. The disadvantage is that she lacks capital for steadily supplying the business. Her dream is to expand her hardware store and to offer more products. She desires to purchase construction materials such as cement, electricity cables, wood, etc. This is her second loan with the institution in two years as an independent borrower.

For these reasons, Dani requests a loan for the purchase of construction materials in order to supply her hardware store and meet the demand of her customers.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for supplying her hardware store and for meeting the demand of her customers.

loans.name: Maria Rubiela

texts.es:
María Rubiela es una mujer de 52 años de edad, que se dedica a la cría de aves, tierna, carismática, sonriente, trabajadora, una persona que con su profesión logra llevar el alimento a su mesa, donde la esperan dos hijos, el mayor de 9 y la menor de 7, los cuales depende económicamente de su madre y actualmente se encuentra estudiando.

Para trabajar Maria Rubiela presenta un problema, tiene las instalaciones para albergar pollos, pero en el momento no cuenta con animales, pues sus responsabilidades en su hogar hacen que se gaste el dinero y en ocasiones no le queda para abastecer su negocio, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de pollos, gallinas para abastecer sus cochera y tener con que trabajar para seguir llevando los gastos de su hogar.

Su sueño es que en su casa no llegue a faltar nada, ir mejorando día a día y que sus muchachos puedan estudiar para buscar un mejor futuro para ellos.
texts.en:
Maria Rubiela is a 52-year-old woman, whose occupation is raising poultry. Tender, charismatic, smiling, and hard-working, she is a person who, with her work, manages to bring food to the table, where two children await her. The oldest is 9 and the youngest is 7, they depend on their mother economically, and they are currently in school.

Maria Rubiela has a problem at work. She has the facilities to house chickens, but at the moment she has no animals. The responsibilities of her home require her to spend money, and at times, she does not have enough to stock her business. This is why she wants to ask for a loan to buy chickens and hens to stock her yard, and have enough to work with, so she can keep covering household expenses. 

Her dreams is that nothing is lacking in her home, to keep improving day by day, and that her boys can study so that they can find a better future for themselves.

loans.use: to buy chickens and hens to stock her yard, and have enough to work with, so she can keep covering household expenses.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 55 years old and married with one child. Evangeline works very hard to provide for her family.

Evangeline runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, and bread.

Evangeline has been in this business for three years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, and bread.

loans.name: Albeiro

texts.es:
Albeiro es un hombre soltero de 35 años de edad, el cual con su profesión de cría de ganado bovino lleva las riendas económicas de su hogar, se preocupa por llevar el alimento a sus padres y el propio.

Albeiro es una persona honesta, leal, caballerosa, con su temperamento, pero muy trabajadora y que hoy necesitan tu ayuda para superar un problema que ha venido afectando al gremio de lecheros el cual es el bajo precio de venta de leche que ha afectado su económica.

El apoyo que busca Albeiro es un aliento económico para la compra de una vaca lechera para aumentar su producción, con el firme propósito de ahuyentar cualquier posibilidad de cierre de su negocio.

Albeiro se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas y agrace a todo aquel que desea apoyarlo en el mantenimiento de su profesión, solo les puede decir Gracias.
texts.en:
Albeiro is a single man, age 35, whose profession of raising dairy cattle holds the economic reins of his household. He is concerned about bringing food to his parents and his own food.

Albeiro is an honest. loyal person, a gentleman in his temperament, but very hard-working and today needs your help to overcome a problem that has been affecting the dairy profession which is the low sale prices of milk which has affected his economic situation.

The support Albeiro is looking for is a loan to purchase a dairy cow to increase his production with the firm intent to dispel whatever possibility of his business closing.

Albeiro promises to make his payments punctually and is thankful to all those who want to support him in keeping his profession, all he can tell them is "thank you".

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to improve his dairy production.

loans.name: Bedford

texts.en:
Bedford is a farmer and salesperson from the Chuka area of Kenya. He keeps livestock and practices crop farming for a living on his 2-acre farm. To generate extra income, Bedford also acts as a middleman in the cereal produce trade.

Because Bedford can arrange a sale more easily than regular farmers can, he prefers to deal with large volumes of cereal produce to generate a significant return. He is seeking a loan to buy cereal produce from local farmers. His plan is to later sell the inventory at a higher price, using his understanding of the market conditions and prices.

Income from this investment will help Bedford to buy services and supplies for his farm such as seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, and veterinary healthcare.

loans.use: to buy cereals

loans.name: Mabelis

texts.es:
Ella es Mabelis, es una campesina aplicada, honesta y carismática que se dedica a la cría de cerdos y aves (Pizco), un tipo de ave muy común en la región pero no tan comercial debido a lo difícil de mantenerla.

Ella es madre de dos hijos tiene 14 y 16 años de edad, se encuentra estudiando y en sus ratos libres apoyan a su madre en su profesión, son una familia muy unidad que juntos tiran para un mismo camino, el camino del progreso, quieren mejorar sus condiciones de vida, comer mejor, vivir mejor, vender mucho más, ser unos comerciantes éxitos y constituir una empresa que perdure en el tiempo.

Con el firme propósito de mejorar su empresa, Mabelis quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de aves (Pizco) y la compra de lechones, con los que aumentara sus animales buscando mejores acuerdos y convenios que representen una buena utilidad que sirva para sus planes de mejoramiento de calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mabelis is a diligent, honest and charismatic woman of the countryside who works raising pigs and poultry (pizco, a very common type of poultry in the region but which is not very commercial because of how difficult it is to keep them).

She is the mother of two children, ages 14 and 16 who are students and, in their free time, they help their mother in her profession. They are a very close-knit family who together head down the same road, the road of progress. They want to improve their living conditions, eat better, live better, sell a lot more, be successful business people, and make a business that lasts over time.

With the firm intention of improving her business, Mabelis wants to ask for a loan to purchase poultry (pizco) and purchase piglets, with which she will increase her animals looking for better agreements that represent a good profit which will serve for her plans of improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase poultry (pizco), feed and purchase piglets.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 54 years old and married with one child.

She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Evangeline is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed, sacks, vaccines, and other supplies to raise her pig.

Evangeline has been in this business for four years and also earns additional income from food vending. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, sacks, vaccines, and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 49 years old and married with eight children.

Lolita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, and bread.

Lolita has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running a general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Lolita aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, and bread.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia es una joven emprendedora, pujante, soñadora de 19 años de edad, la cual se quiere dedicar a la agricultura, su afán de ser empresaria, de tener éxito va de la mano con sus aspiraciones de estudio y tener una vida como independiente.

Ella es madre de un pequeño de 2 años de edad, quiere sacarlo adelante y juntos gozar de una excelente calidad de vida.

La idea de Alicia es seguir con sus raíces campesinas, ejercer la profesión que aprendió de sus padres y cultivar Maíz.

Ella en el momento tiene en su poder las semillas de Maíz, pero necesita un apoyo para preparar la tierra y los insumos como abonos, riegos e insecticidas, por ello necesita de tu apoyo para lograr sembrar esas semillas de maíz y que estas a su vez se conviertan en el soporte económico para ella y su hijo.
texts.en:
Alicia is an entrepreneurial woman, who pushes forward, a dreamer who is 19 years old. She wants to work in agriculture; her ambition is to be a businesswoman, and to have success, which goes hand in hand with her study aspirations and to have an independent life. 

She is the mother of a child who is 2 years old. She wants to help him get ahead, and together enjoy an excellent quality of life. 

Alicia’s idea is to continue with her agriculture roots, and practice the profession she learned from her parents and grow corn.

At the moment, she has corn seeds in her possession, but she needs some help to prepare the land and the inputs, such as manure, irrigation pumps, and insecticides. This is why she needs your help, to be able to plants these corn seeds, and that these become the economic support for her and her son.

loans.use: to buy inputs to plant her corn seeds.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Edna works hard to support her family.

She has a food production and vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Edna is borrowing PHP 140,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production.

Edna has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Con tan solo 23 años de edad José puede sentirse orgullo de tener una empresa de cría de ganado de levante y dedicar su tiempo a mantener su familia y ayudar siempre a sus padres quienes le dieron el conocimiento y toda la ayuda posible para que iniciara su vida como independiente.

La principal dificultad que ha encontrado José para desarrollar su actividad es la fuerte competencia que hay en el sector, ganaderos con un mayor número de animales que se pueden dar el lujo de bajar sus precios, ponen en riesgo la económica de pequeños empresarios que apenas están iniciando.

Para No recaer en esto José quiere realizar un préstamo para la compra de Ganado de levante y alimento de engorde, su propósito es tener un negocio con precios justos y competitivos, y que su empresa de destaque por la calidad y el buen servicio.

Su principal sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y tener un finca, rodeada de muchos animales.
texts.en:
At only 23 years old, José can be proud of having a business raising cattle and spending his time supporting his family and always helping his parents who gave him the knowledge and all the possible help so that he began his life independently.

The primary difficulty that José has encountered to develop his business is the strong competition in the sector. Cattle farms with a larger number of animals, that can have the luxury of lowering their prices, put at risk the economic situation of small business owners who are just beginning.

In order to avoid falling into this, José wants to take out a loan to purchase cattle to raise and fattening feed. His goal is to have a business with fair and competitive prices, and that his business stands out for its quality and good service. His principle dream is to improve the conditions of his house and to have a farm, surrounded by many animals.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise and fattening feed; he is working to be able to get a farm one day.

loans.name: Ricardo Abrahan

texts.es:
Ricardo, está necesitando de un nuevo crédito para comprar una máquina de cortar pelo, tijeras, gel para el cabello, etc., contará con los materiales básicos para dar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
Al utilizar créditos en el mejoramiento de su negocio Ricardo ha tenido una experiencia positiva, su peluquería tiene mejor inventario y sus ingresos son bastante favorables.
texts.en:
Ricardo needs another loan to purchase clippers, scissors, hair gel, etc.; he will have the basic materials to give his customers good service.

Using loans in improving his business, Ricardo has had a positive experience. His barber shop has a better inventory and his income is pretty good.

loans.use: to purchase clippers, scissors, hair gel, etc.; he will have the basic materials to give his customers good service.

loans.name: Cristian Manuel

texts.es:
Cristian, es soltero, vive con su familia, tiene un hijo pero no vive con él, su negocio es ofrecer el servicio de cortes de cabello, lo inicio hace dos años junto a uno de sus amigos, actualmente lo administra solo debido a que su amigo salió del país.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar un sillón reclinable y accesorios para la máquina de cortar cabello, le permitirá darle mejor imagen a su negocio y sobre todo darle un buen servicio a sus clientes.
Su visión es cancelar con puntualidad las cuotas del crédito, tener mejores ganancias para ayudar con los gastos familiares y crecer profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Cristian is single, lives with his family, has a son but doesn't life with him, and his business is providing haircuts. He began it two years ago with one of his friends. Currently, he runs it alone since his friend left the country.

He asks for a loan to purchase a reclining chair and accessories for clippers, which will allow him to give his business a better image and, above all, give his customers good service.

His plan is to make his loan payments punctually, have more income to help with the family expenses, and to grow professionally.

loans.use: to purchase a reclining chair and accessories for clippers; it will allow him to give his business a better image and, above all, give his customers good service.

loans.name: Maria Del Transito

texts.es:
María, se siente satisfecha por el servicio recibido y por la facilidad de pago que la institución le brinda, ese motivo hace que se sienta decidida a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar una nueva máquina para cortar cabello, le permitirá mejorar la atención que da a sus clientes.
El capital que se le presto anteriormente le ha sido de ayuda para ir mejorando su negocio y cuenta con ingresos estables, los cuales le sirven para darle a su familia mejor alimentación, vestuario y salud.
texts.en:
María feels satisfied by the service she received and the ease of payments from the institution. That motive makes her feel determined to ask for a new loan to buy a new hair-cutting machine. This will allow her to improve the care she gives her customers.

The money previously lent to her has helped to improve her business and have a stable income. This helps her to give her family better food, clothing and health.

loans.use: to buy a new hair-cutting machine, which will allow her to improve the care she gives her customers.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
María tiene una venta de tortas y jugos, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 2 años, inicio con fondos propios, posteriormente inicio a utilizar financiamientos para ir mejorando su negocio, su horario de trabajo es de nueve de la mañana a seis de la tarde, vive en una zona donde hay mucha afluencia de clientes. María es madre soltera de dos hijos, uno ya asiste a preparatoria y el otro está recién nacido, lucha para ir dando a sus hijo lo necesario.
El financiamiento le ayudara a realizar la compra de embutidos, carnes, pan, jugos, azúcar, aderezos, leche, etc., podrá elaborar las tortas y jugos, además incluirá la venta de licuados y otros bebidas, pretende atender mejor a sus clientes y darles los que ellos demanden.
Sus proyectos son tener un local más grande, contar con equipo adecuado para realizar sus actividades, mejorar su situación económica y salir a delante con su familia.
texts.en:
María sells pastries and juices, she has worked in this business for 2 years. She began with her own funds, and later she began to use loans to continue improving her business. Her work schedule is from nine in the morning to six in the evening. She lives in an area where there is a lot of traffic of customers. María is a single mother of two children, one is in secondary school and the other was recently born. She struggles to give her children what they need.

The loan will help her to purchase cold cuts, meat, bread, juices, sugar, seasonings, milk, etc., to be able to make the pastries and juices, in addition she will include the sale of smoothies and other drinks. She plans to serve her customers better and give them what they want.
