Her plans are to have a larger retail space, have the appropriate equipment to do her work, improve her economic situation, and get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to purchase cold cuts, meat, bread, juices, sugar, seasonings, milk, etc. to be able to make the pastries and juices, in addition she will include the sale of smoothies and other drinks.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa Fernanda es una mujer de 29 años de edad, que se dedica a la venta de mercancía, lo hace por venta de catálogo, actividad que inicio a realizar por necesidad económica y con la que ha ido solventando sus necesidades económicas.

Ella es madre de un pequeño de 10 años de edad, vive en una vereda, lo que complica mucha su actividad ya que para vender un producto debe realizar largos desplazamientos, pero a ella no le importa ya que gracias a esta actividad pueden gozar de un alimento en la mesa.

Los sueños de Luisa Fernanda son dos, comprar una vivienda y pagar la educación de sus hijos.

Luisa Fernanda solicita un préstamo el motivo es que ella vende productos como ropa, accesorios, cosméticos, pijamas, perfumes, calzado y al vivir en una vereda, para ella es mucho más fácil tener a su disposición variedad de productos para vender de contado.
texts.en:
Luisa Fernanda is a 29 year old woman, who makes a living selling merchandise through magazines. She started doing this work due to economic necessity and has been funding her economic needs. She is the mother of a 10 year old child.

She lives in a rural district, which makes her job hard because she needs to travel long distances to sell a product. She does not care though because thanks to this job, they can enjoy having food in the house.

Luisa Fernanda's dreams are to buy a home and to pay for her children's education. She is asking for a loan, being that she sells products such as clothing, accessories, cosmetics, pajamas, perfume, and shoes, and living in a rural district, it is easier for her to have a variety of products available to sell for cash.

loans.use: to supply herself with products such as clothing, accessories, cosmetics, pajamas, perfume, and shoes.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia Yanet; pertenece al banco comunal MOSOC KILLA,la socia continua  dedicándose al negocio de venta de comida caseras ,la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose  a la venta por catalogo perfumes, cremas, labiales entre otros productos de belleza, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower Yanet belongs to the communal bank Mosoc Killa.

She continues working in the business of selling homemade food. She has been in this business a long time which is going well thanks to the effort she puts in each day to her work. At the same time she continues catalog sales of perfumes, creams, lipsticks and other beauty products. She is a responsible and diligent person. This is the way she supports her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy perfume and other items. She is grateful the the loan granted and she agrees to make her payment on time.

loans.use: to buy perfume and other items

loans.name: Oscar David

texts.es:
Oscar, de 49 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y es padre de dos hijos, que actualmente están  estudiando en la escuela. 

Oscar, es comerciante de ropa para cama, damas, caballeros y niños; también se dedica a la venta de medicina natural, estas actividades son su principal fuente de ingresos; su jornada de trabajo comienza desde muy temprano a las cinco de la mañana, porque los lugares que visita están muy lejos de su casa, pero utiliza una motocicleta para transportarse hasta estos lugares.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar cuatro docenas de sabanas para cama, 1 docena de pantalones para damas,  caballeros, niños y ropa interior para ambos sexos, esto le ayudara a tener más variedad de ropa para ofrecer y generar mayores ganancias económicas para su familia.

Oscar, sueña en un futuro poder colocar su propio local, donde pueda vender la ropa y la medicina natural; pero también desea poder ayudar a sus hijos para que puedan estudiar la carrera que más les guste y puedan desarrollarse mejor en la vida.
texts.en:
Oscar, 49 years old, went to school through secondary, is partnered, his partner works taking care of the household tasks, and he is the father of two children who are currently going to school.

Oscar is a salesman of bed linens, and clothing for women, men, and children. He also works selling natural medicines. This work is is primary source of income. His work day begins very early at five in the morning, because the places that he goes are very far from his house, but he uses a motorcycle to get himself to those places.

The loan is needed to purchase four dozen bed sheets, 1 dozen pants for women, men and children, and underwear for both sexes. This will help him to have more variety of clothing to offer and generate more earnings for his family.

Oscar dreams of being able to establish his own retail space in the future, where he can sell the clothing and natural medicine, but also he wants to be able to help his children so they can study for the degree they like the most and they can develop themselves better in life.

loans.use: to purchase 4 dozen bed sheets, 1 dozen pants for women, men, and children, and underwear for both sexes.

loans.name: Lineth Patricia

texts.es: Lineth de 23 años es una joven empresaria que gracias a la herencia adquirida por intermedio de su madre en la producción de Bollos de Maíz, determinó que esta actividad podría convertirse en su fuente principal de ingresos; sin lugar a la duda, encaminó todos sus esfuerzos a sacar adelante esta propuesta de la que ha obtenido los resultados esperados.  Todos los días en compañía de su madre llegan hasta los depósitos del municipio de San Juan de Nepomuceno a realizar las compras maíz tierno, queso, mantequilla y tusas del maíz,  necesarios para la elaboración de los bollos y una vez elaborado su producto final es distribuido directamente a sus clientes.  Con la intención de invertir en su negocio de producción de bollos e incorporarse en el comercio de productos de belleza, está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar materia prima; maíz, queso y tusas, así mismo invertirá en productos de belleza y mercancías varias.  Con esta inversión podrá explorar nuevas oportunidades de ingresos para su familia.  Su meta a futuro es crecer en su negocio y obtener las utilidades esperadas.
texts.en:
Lineth is 23 years old and a young businesswoman thanks to the inheritance she received from her mother making Bollos de Maíz (corn muffins). She decided that this job could become her main income source. Without a doubt, she directed all of her efforts to support this proposition, and she has obtained the expected results.

Every day, in the company of her mother, she arrives at the warehouses in the town of San Juan de Nepomuceno to buy sweetcorn, cheese, butter and corn cobs. These are needed to make the corn muffins and once the final product is made, she distributes them directly to her customers.

With the intention of investing in her business making muffins and joining the business of beauty products, she is applying for her first CrediKiva through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy ingredients: corn, cheese and corncobs. She will also invest into beauty produces and various merchandise. With this investment, she will be able to explore new opportunities of income for her family. Her future goal is to grow her business and get the expected profits.

loans.use: to buy ingredients: corn, cheese and corn cobs. She will also invest into beauty products and various merchandise.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.es:
Macaria, de 44 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, no continuo con sus estudios universitarios debido a la situación económica de su familia, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos todos son mayores de edad y tienen sus propias familias y en su casa viven 5 personas con ella, una tía, su nuera y tres 3 nietos pero ninguno depende económicamente de ella.

Macaria, se dedica a impartir clases de alfabetización en los caseríos, ella les enseña a las personas que no saben leer ni escribir, esto para contribuir y reducir la alta tasa de alfabetización que existe en el país; pero además de eso ella se dedica a la agricultura, siembra granos básicos y hortalizas para su sustento en invierno.

Macaria, necesita el crédito para sembrar hortalizas y comprar abono, fertilizantes e insecticidas para preparar la tierra  y pagar mano de obra, con las cosechas que le brinden estas siembras, ella obtendrá ingresos económicos.

Macaria, desea poder seguir estudiando y terminar sus estudios; además desea tener un terreno grande para que pueda sembrar más y obtener gran cantidad de hortalizas y poder venderlas a las personas o a las tiendas.
texts.en:
Macaria, 44 years old, went to school through secondary, and didn't continue with her university education due to her family's economic situation. She is a single mother, has 4 children, all of whom are adults and have their own families, and in her house there are 5 people who live with her, an aunt, her daughter-in-law and 3 grand children, but none of them depend on her economically.

Macaria works teaching literacy classes in the villages. She teaches people who don't know how to read or write, in order to contribute and reduce the high illiteracy rate that there is in the country. Put, in addition to this, she works in agriculture, she plants basic grains and vegetables for their sustenance in the winter.

Macaria needs the loan to plant vegetables and purchase manure, fertilizer and insecticides to prepare the land and pay labor costs. With the harvests that these crops will bring, she will get income.

Macaria wants to be able to continue going to school and finish her education, in addition she wants to have a large plot of land where she can grow more and get a large amount of vegetables and be able to sell them to people or to stores.

loans.use: to plant vegetables and purchase manure, fertilizers and insecticides to prepare the land and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando tiene 50 años de edad , conviviente, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, Costa norte de Perú.

Rolando se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su moto mototaxi, hace 05 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio; solicita préstamo para invertir en arreglos en la infraestructura de local para guardar su mototaxi esto con la finalidad de dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y mantener en mejores condiciones su herramienta de trabajo, obtener mayores ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rolando is 50 years old, married and has one child in his care. He lives in his own home in a rural area of the district of Oyotún, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Rolando has been making a living providing transportation on his motorbike taxi for 5 years. The business is located in his home. He is asking for a loan to invest into making repairs on the infrastructure of his home to store his motorbike taxi. This way he can give a better service to his customers and maintain his work tool in better conditions, while getting better earnings and thus improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs on the infrastructure of his home to store his motorbike taxi.

loans.name: Whylyn

texts.en:
Whylyn is operating a snack vending business in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. Her husband supports her as a construction worker and doing some carpentry jobs. Through her snack vending business, Whylyn is able to provide for the needs of her family, especially in times when her husband has no job. She is thankful to Paglaum MPC, which provides her with the necessary capital for her business.

Currently she avails a loan to purchase ingredients such as flour, bananas, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, lumpia wrappers, cheese and milk for her snack vending business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as flour, bananas, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, lumpia wrappers, cheese and milk for a snack vending business.

loans.name: Proserpina

texts.en:
Proserpina is a pensioner-member of Paglaum MPC, where she enjoys all services the coop can offer. She is a widow with four children, all are adult-age.

She avails a loan from PMPC, this time to pay for a hospitalization bill.

loans.use: to pay for a hospitalization bill.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 59 years old; she is married with three children of school-age. She owns and operates a motor spare parts store and motor repair shop with her husband in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

She doesn't want to run out of supplies in her store, so she borrowed a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase motor lubricants and spare parts to sell.

loans.use: to purchase motor lubricants and spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian es una mujer de 43 años de edad que nunca renuncio a sus sueños, ella cree firmemente en ellos por alcanzarlos, a lo largo de su vida siempre ha querido montar un restaurante, peor diferentes motivos como el nacimiento de sus hijos su crianza, dificultades económicas frenaron ese sueño, pero lo más importante es que nunca desistió de ellos y hoy solo le falta un pequeño empujón, un aliento económico para completar el dinero con el que comprara los últimos implementos de su cocina.

Miriam tiene parte del dinero para comprar una estufa industrial, juego de ollas, utensilios e insumos para preparar comidas típicas, pero le falta un total de un 1 millón de pesos colombianos para lograrlo, por ello pide tu apoyo para terminar de juntar ese dinero y empezar ese sueño que tanto postergo de tener su restaurante.

Su sueño es trabajar muy fuerte por afianzarse en el mercado y generar los recursos suficientes para pagar la educación de sus muchachos que tanto la han apoyado.
texts.en:
Mirian is a 43-year-old woman who has never given up her dreams. She believes firmly in them in order to achieve them. All through her life, she has always wanted to establish a restaurant but different reasons, such as the birth of her children and raising them and economic difficulties, blocked this dream. But, the most important is that she never gave them up and now she only lacks a little push, a loan to use with the money with which she will purchase the last tools for her kitchen.

Mirian has part of the money to purchase an industrial stove, a set of pans, utensils and supplies to prepare traditional meals, but she lacks a total of 1 million Colombian pesos to achieve it. So, she asks for your support to finish gathering this money and begin this dream, that she has put off so long, of having a restaurant.

Her dream is to work very hard to establish herself in the market and generate enough resources to pay for her children's education, who have supported her so much.

loans.use: to begin her own business; she will have a restaurant and the loan will be used with her savings to purchase fixed assets and supplies.

loans.name: German Evelio

texts.es:
Siempre con una sonrisa dibujada en su rostro, con el mayor entusiasmo y disposición para atender a sus clientes y vecinos sale diariamente el señor German, un hombre de 52 años de edad que tiene un negocio de tienda de abarrotes (la típica tienda de barrio).

German es padre de 3 hijos, tiene su negocio desde el año 2003 y desde entonces ha logrado una estabilidad económica y felicidad, por realizar una profesión con gusto.

La sostenibilidad de su negocio, mejorar las ventas, ser competitivo son los retos que diariamente se pone German, ese deseo de superación es el que lo ha mantenido en el mercado.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de víveres, productos de aseo doméstico, víveres, granos para abastecer su tienda, un préstamo tuyo, pueda traer felicidad a un cliente que goza de compartir y atender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
He always has a smile on his face. With the greatest enthusiasm and disposition to serve his customers and neighbors, German goes out every day. He is a 52-year-old man who has a grocery store (a typical neighborhood store).

German is the father of 3 children, he has had his business since 2003 and, since then, he has achieved economic stability and happiness by carrying out his profession with delight.

The sustainability of his business, improving his sales and being competitive are the challenges that German faces daily. His desire to improve himself is what has kept him in the market.

He asks for a loan to purchase groceries, household cleaning supplies, and grains to stock his store. Your loan could bring happiness to a client who enjoys sharing and serving his customers.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, household cleaning supplies, and grains to stock his store.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
El socio Elias pertenece al banco comunal MOSOC KILLA, el socio continua dedicándose a su negocio de su taller de mecánica, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, el socio continua trabajando en su mecánica atendiendo a sus clientes que solicitan sus servicios, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de gatas entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Elias belongs to communal bank MOSOC KILLA.
His auto repair shop is still in business.
He is a very responsible and hard-working person who supports his family thanks to his business.
He asks for the loan to buy mechanical jacks, among other items.
He is grateful for the loan and promises to be punctual in his repayments.

loans.use: to buy mechanical jacks, among other items.

loans.name: Sonxaida

texts.en:
Sonxaida is 62 years old; she is married with one adult-age daughter. She lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental, wherein she is an active member of Paglaum MPC.

Recently, she borrowed an amount of PHP 20,000 to purchase stainless steel round bars, iron sheets and the labor cost for a gate repair.

loans.use: to purchase stainless steel round bars, iron sheets and the labor cost for a gate repair.

loans.name: Jumalene

texts.en: Jumalene is 29 years old and married with school age children from Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She manages a junk shop that gives her an approximate income of PHP 40,000.00 per month. She is a dedicated and hardworking businesswoman that, at an early age, became successful as we say in her chosen business ventures. Jumalene said that her success is credited to Paglaum MPC where she signed up for membership. She was provided with financial assistance and financial literacy training that she later on used in her business. She managed her membership and business so well that she was awarded as "Tatak-Paglaum Award for Microentrepreneurs". Recently, Jumalene got the help of her 17th loan of PHP 50,000 to buy scrap materials for her junk shop business.

loans.use: to buy scrap materials for her junk shop business

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 62 years old, married with 7 adult-age children from Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She has a sari-sari store (convenience store) that has existed for more than 15 years. This business of hers has give her additional income that provides for the needs of her family.

To restock her store with more items, she took a loan from Paglaum MPC, where she is an active member. The amount will be used to restock the store with consumable items like canned goods, noodles, coffee, milk and others.

loans.use: to restock the store with consumable items like canned goods, noodles, coffee, milk and others.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Orville

texts.en:
Orville is an active member of Paglaum MPC who enjoys all the perks of a member. He is 68 years old, married, and has adult children.

Orville is busy running his fishing operations and tilling their own land. Both business ventures have been supported by the coop.

He said he's secure financially knowing he can always turn to the cooperative, but he wants to be prepared also for unprecedented life events so he also avails life insurance of the coop. Now that his one year life insurance expires, he is borrowing an amount to pay for life insurance premiums. Orville believes that it is better to be prepared than to be held by the neck by unexpected circumstances.

loans.use: to pay for life insurance premiums.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
Moisés, vive con su familia la cual está compuesta por su esposa y seis hijos, no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero, su actividad económica es la crianza de ganado, cultivo de granos básicos y venta de madera, lo atiende con ayuda de dos mozos, tiene un negocio diversificado para lograr generar los ingresos necesarios con los que puede apoyar en los gastos de su hogar.
Con el crédito comprara insumos agrícolas y concentrado para alimentar al ganado, tendrá a su disposición materiales básicos para fortalecer su negocio y continuar trabajando, su objetivo es tener un negocio más rentable y continuar disminuyendo las necesidades familiares.
Sus sueños son mantenerse trabajando para que su negocio sea más competitivo, mejorar su vivienda y darle a su familia oportunidades de superación.
texts.en:
Moisés lives with his wife and their six children.
They do not receive any help from any relatives abroad.
Moisés raises cattle, grows basic grains, and sells wood, all with the help of two employees.
The reason his activities are so diverse is that it is the only way to generate enough income to support his household.
With the loan, he will purchase farm supplies and cattle feed.
Such are the basic supplies he needs to strengthen his business and keep it going.
His goal is to make his business more profitable so as to gradually lift his family out of poverty.
His dreams include staying in business to increase competitiveness, improving his house, and giving his family better prospects.

loans.use: to buy the basic supplies he needs to improve his business.

loans.name: Fatima Margarita

texts.es:
Fátima, esta progresando con su negocio y solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar sandalias, zapatos para bebé, chancletas y prendas de vestir para ambos sexos, ofrecerá mercadería nueva y surtida para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
El crédito anterior le ha dado un aporte muy importante para mantener su negocio funcionando, tuvo recursos económicos con los que compro básicamente productos necesarios para vender más y tener mejores ingresos con los que puede ayudar a su esposo con la alimentación familiar.
texts.en:
Fátima is progressing with her business and is asking for a new loan to buy sandals, infant shoes, flip-flops, and items of clothing for both sexes. She will offer new merchandise and supply to satisfy the needs of her customers.

The previous loan has given her a very important input to keep her business functioning. She had economic resources that she used to basically buy necessary products to sell more and have better earnings, which she can use to help her husband with the food for the family.

loans.use: to buy sandals, infant shoes, flip-flops, and items of clothing for both sexes. She will offer new merchandise and supply to satisfy the needs of her customers.

loans.name: Pilar

texts.es:
Pilar es una madre de 52 años de edad la cual se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pavos, una actividad que inicio con el propósito de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y brindarle a su hijo que ahora tiene 16 años de edad mejores oportunidades para el futuro.

Ella es una persona responsable y trabajadora la cual inicio el negocio empíricamente, guiado de su entusiasmo y ganas por mejorar y a pesar de los diferentes problemas que ha tenido, muchos de ellos por la falta de capital para invertir en su negocio, sigue firme y con optimismo.

Para mejorar su negocio Pilar solicita un préstamo el cual quiere invertir en la compra de cerdos, aves y alimento de engorde, la ayuda económica será un aliciente muy grande en su negocio ya que abastecerá los terrenos y dispondrá de animales para la temporada navideña que se aproxima.
texts.en:
Pilar, 52 and a mother, raises pigs and turkeys.
She started the business to improve her family's standard of living and give her son, now aged 16, better prospects.
A responsible and hard-working person, she started the business with enthusiasm and desire for improvement her only guides, and had to learn along the way.
Despite encountering various problems, most of which were due to the lack of working capital, she persists in her choice and is optimistic about it.
Pilar asks for a loan to buy pigs, poultry, and feed, in order to improve her business.
Financial help will be a decisive element for her, since she will be able to take care of the land and put animals on it so as to be ready for the coming Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy pigs, poultry, and feed.

loans.name: Ana Griselda

texts.es:
Griselda es una madre luchadora, verraca, pujante, ella junto a su esposo levantaron una familia conformada por 4 hijos, empezaron desde abajo, no tenían nada, lo que han logrado todo ha sido con trabajo y esmero, con sueños, con largas jornadas laborales.

Griselda por su parte para aportar en los gastos del hogar tiene un negocio de cría de cerdos, actividad que desarrolla con orgullo y más por todo lo que ha significado a lo largo de su vida.

Griselda solicita un apoyo económico para potenciar su negocio, el dinero lo quiere invertir en la compra de 4 cerdos y la adecuación de las chiqueras.
texts.en:
Griselda, a mother, is hard-working, brave, and has a will of iron.
Together with her husband, she raised a family of four.
They built their life from the ground up, since they had nothing to start with.
Everything they have they earned through hard work and dedication, working long hours to make their dreams come true.
Griselda contributes to household expenses with her pig farm, a business she is extremely proud of because of the great deal it has meant to her throughout her life.
Griselda asks for financial support to improve her business.
She will use the loan to buy four pigs and recondition the pig pens.

loans.use: to buy four pigs and recondition the pig pens.

loans.name: German Dario

texts.es:
German es un hombre de 52 años de edad, una persona que se destaca en el municipio de Taraza por realizar exquisitas preparaciones con pescado, actividad que empezó en el año 2014, guiado por su deseo de tener su propia empresa y con el apoyo de su familia.

Es casado y tiene 4 hijos de 16, 11, 10 y 5 años de edad, se enorgullece de que todos se encuentren estudiando y puedan gozar de un cálido hogar.

German trabaja con un propósito el cual es tener un restaurante, un sueño que lo ve cada vez más cerca y ahora mucho más que es independiente, pero quiere tener el restaurante es por dejar un negocio que sus hijos puedan continuar, en pocas palabras volver este negocio uno que se heredé de generación en generación.

German quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de pescado en cantidades, con los que espera seguir trabajando los 7 días de la semana con la misma intensidad de 10 horas cada día.
texts.en:
German is a 52- year-old man, a person who stands out in the municipality of Taraza for making exquisite dishes with fish, work that he began in the year 2014, guided by his desire to have his own business, and with the support of his family.

He is married and has 4 children, ages 16, 11, 10, and 5. He is proud that they are all going to school and can enjoy a warm home.

German works with one goal, which is to have a restaurant, a dream that he sees himself approaching and now much more because he is independent. But he wants to have a restaurant in order to leave a business that his children can continue, basically to make this business one that is passed down from generation to generation.

German wants to ask for a loan to purchase an assortment of fish in quantity, with which he hopes to continue working 7 days a week with the same intensity of 10 hours each day.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of fish, the client works preparing all sorts of food with a fish base.

loans.name: Jhon David

texts.es:
Jhon es un joven de 28 años de edad, padre de dos hermosas princesas de 8 y 6 años.
Se desempeñaba como conductor de una moto taxi, en cual tenía que liquidar a un jefe, pero gracias a la inclusión de Interactuar en su vida, vio la oportunidad de volverse independiente.

Ahora con mucho entusiasmo, ganas de progreso Jhon se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una moto, para prestar ya como independiente le servicio de moto taxi, un préstamo que de seguro el traerá progreso a su hogar.
texts.en:
Jhon is a 28-year-old young man, the father of two lovely princesses, ages 8 and 6.

He works as a motorcycle taxi driver, in which he has to pay a boss, but thanks to the inclusion of Interactuar in his life, he saw the opportunity of becoming independent.

Now, with a lot of enthusiasm and desire to progress, Jhon is asking for a loan to purchase a motorcycle to work independently providing motorcycle taxi services, a loan that will surely bring progress to his household.

loans.use: to get a motorcycle to work offering transportation services independently.

loans.name: Era

texts.en:
Era buys and sells flowers and ornamental plants. She nurtures them until they look good enough to be sold and delivers them to big cities within Mindanao.

This business venture give her big income that has sent all her children to college until they've got jobs.

Recently, she has availed a loan to purchase ornamental plants to grow and sell.

loans.use: to purchase ornamental plants to grow and sell.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta is a vegetable vendor in the local public market. She and her husband have been in this type of business since they got married. She's doing well with her business and making good sales, but an unprecedented event crippled her husband so that he was advised to stay in the hospital for several days. Julieta asks for financial assistance from the cooperative and loan an amount of PHP 20,000 to pay for the hospital bills of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for the hospital bills of her husband

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.en: Saturnino is 57 years old, married with two adult children and lives in Dipolo, Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. His wish is to send his children to school until they finish college and land a good job. He doesn't want to see his children doing back-breaking work in tilling and cultivating land like what he's doing to provide for their needs. Saturnino is a hardworking farmer and a loving father to his children. As he recalls, everything has been made possible with the financial support extended to farmers like him by Paglaum MPC. To get a head start for the next cropping season, he asks for the help of a PHP 30,000 loan to pay for land preparation like plowing and harrowing and to purchase a good variety of seedlings for healthier, heavier and more produce.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation like plowing and harrowing and to purchase a good variety of seedlings for healthier, heavier and more produce.

loans.name: Junjie

texts.en: Junjie has wide experience in farming. He has mastered farming activities from growing, caring, and harvesting to earning income as well. Junjie has cultivated his own four hectares of rice land for 10 years.  Like a farmer, Junjie has nurtured his membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. He knows he can always turn to the Cooperative for his financial needs. Recently, he applied for a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase rice seeds that will result in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings. Someday, Junjie hopes to purchase another rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have result in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Mirian Yolanda

texts.es:
Mirian, de 46 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, debido a las condiciones económicas de su familia, no logro continuar con sus estudios y también porque el conflicto armado les afecto y por esa razón toda su familia tuvo que emigrar al país vecino; es madre de 6 hijos, todos son adultos y algunos ya están acompañados, ella vive junto a su esposo y tres nietos más. 

Mirian, se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su casa, pero también junto a su esposo se dedica a la ganadería y a la crianza de gallinas ponedoras y pollos de engorde; también trabaja en la agricultura, de estas actividades generan buenos ingresos económicos para su familia.

El financiamiento del crédito lo necesita para colocar una granja de pollos de engorde, específicamente comprará 100 pollitos y reparará la cerca del corral y comprará 3 cerditos para crecerlos. 

Sus sueños a futuro son incrementar su negocio y colocar una tienda en su casa, además desea que sus nietos terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Mirian, 46, went to school until the sixth form.
Due to her family's dire financial straits, she was not able to go any further.
On top of that, the armed conflict pushed the whole family to flee to the neighbouring country.
A mother of six, she lives with her husband and three grandchildren. Her children are all adults and some of them already have a family of their own.
Mirian, a housewife, also helps her husband raise cattle, egg-laying hens, and chickens for fattening.
She also works as a farmer. Thanks to these activities, she is able to help support her family.
She needs the loan to build a barn for the chickens and buy 100 chicks to fatten.
She will also repair the fence around the pig pen and buy three piglets to raise.
Her dreams for the future include expanding her business, setting up a shop in her house, and seeing her grandchildren graduate.

loans.use: to buy 100 chicks and three piglets, and to repair the pig pen.

loans.name: Ana Elvira

texts.es:
Ella es Ana es una mujer que labora como independiente desde su hogar, con su negocio de cría de peces. Es casada y fruto de su matrimonio nacieron dos hijos.

Ana vive en el municipio de Cerete, una zona de bajos recursos, donde escasea las oportunidades de empleo y lso recursos con lso que sobreviven lso habitantes viene más por empresa propia.

Ana cansada de solo sobrevivir se dispuso a mejorar su negocio, ella quiere que sus hijos tengan aspiraciones, que no se resignen a tener la vida que han tenido hasta el momento, por ello quiere dedicar todo su tiempo a mejorar su producción y venta de peces.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de alevines, su propósito es abastecer sus estanques y conforme mejoren las ventas, iniciar la excavación de otro pozo para albergar mayor número de peces.
texts.en:
This is Ana, a woman who works independently from her home with a business raising fish. She is married and from her marriage, two children were born.

Ana lives in the municipality of Cerete, an area of limited resources, where scarcity of work opportunities and resources with which to survive causes people to have their own businesses.

Ana, tired of only surviving, set about to improve her business. She wants her children to have aspirations, that they don't resign themselves to having the life that they have had up to now. So, she wants to dedicate all her time to improving her production and sale of fish.

She asks for a loan to purchase young fish, her goal is to stock her ponds and as her sales improve, begin excavating another well to support a larger number of fish.

loans.use: to purchase young fish to stock her ponds.

loans.name: Fuerza Compartida Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “FUERZA COMPARTIDA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Josefina del Carmen ella es casada y tiene 73 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de artesania, la socia vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, la socia vende diferentes tejidos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.

Las socias que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo. 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de celulares, negocio de venta de tortas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrowers belong to the Fuerza Compartida communal bank. This bank is located in Cusco district, which is in Cusco province and Cusco department.

The borrower is Josefina del Carmen. She is married and is 73 years old. She works in her crafts business. She sells woven items, sweaters, blankets and woven items. She sells different woven and knit items. She works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has been in this business for 8 years now and it is going very well for her. The borrower's dream is to expand her business selling knit and woven items. She asks for the loan to purchase knit items, sweaters and woven items.

The members who are attached to the group photo took the photo after the meeting because they asked permission due to work reasons.

The other borrowers work at a business selling cell phones, a business selling pastries, a grocery store business and a restaurant business.

The borrower is grateful to those who are part of this dream through this platform and promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase knit items, sweaters, and woven items.

loans.name: Arzykan

texts.ru: Арзыкан успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве на сегодняшний день есть 3 коровы, 100 овец, 3 лошади. На 4,68 Га земли выращивает фасоль и клевер для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 26,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Арзыкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) для покупки коровы для увеличения поголовья скота и увеличения объемов реализации экологически-чистого молока. Доходы от кредита Арзыкан хочет вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Arzykan successfully repaid her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to the Kiva Fund and to everyone who helped her with financing. Today she has three cows, 100 sheep, and three horses. She grows beans and clover for sale on 4.68 hectares of land. Her monthly income is up to 26,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Arzykan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow in order to increase the size of her herd and increase the volume of her sales of organic milk. Arzykan wants to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow in order to increase her volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Nicomedez

texts.en:
Nicomedez is a pensioner-member of Paglaum MPC. He is 82 years old, married, and has three adult children. He is from Calamba, Misamis Occidental.

Recently, he borrowed an amount of PHP 28,000 to purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.en:
Felipe is 57 years old, married, and has six adult children. He is from Calamba, Misamis Occidental.

He owns a convenience store that augments their monthly income. Aside from owning a convenience store, he is also a fish vendor. He has a joint monthly income from both businesses of approximately PHP 30,000 that supports the needs of his family.

Recently, he availed an amount to restock the store with consumable items like canned goods, noodles and others.

loans.use: to restock his store with consumable items like canned goods, noodles and others.

loans.name: Abir

texts.en:
Abir's previous loan successfully allowed her to expand her accessories store's product line that now includes purses. She was able to attract new customers and meet their needs, which increased her sales and income. She is also now exclusively focused on growing her business and has stopped working as a tutor at a lessons center at night.
Abir is now asking for a 2,313,613 Lebanese pounds ($1,550 USD) loan from Kiva field partner Ibdaa. She will be using the loan to supply her shop with more products.
She is still engaged and living with her parents, her brother and her sister but she is planning to start her own family soon as she and her fiancé become more financially stable.

loans.use: to increase her stock and expand her product line.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is engaged in selling various types of clothing and apparel for all ages. She is making good sales from this business and she has the advantage of her business location.

Recently, she availed a loan to purchase clothes in bulk to sell.

loans.use: to purchase clothes in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Rico

texts.en:
Rico is a hardworking businessman who never gets tired of tending his motor repair shop and store. He has been in this business venture for 12 years and it gives him an income of PHP 15,000 every month.

He has expanded this business and now offers vulcanizing services, radiator repair and overhauling of vehicles.

Recently, he availed a loan to purchase spare parts for his motor repair shop and store.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his motor repair shop and store.

loans.name: Agrifina

texts.en:
Agrifina owns a sari-sari store (convenience store) that augments her monthly income. She is glad that she is successfully sending all her children to school until they finish college.

This time, her youngest son is applying for job abroad and he needs a placement fee for it. She asks a loan of PHP 50,000 to pay for the placement fee of her son.

loans.use: to pay for the placement fee of her son.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
María, se siente satisfecha por el apoyo que la institución le brindo por medio del crédito anterior, pues le dan una respuesta positiva en un corto tiempo, está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar bebidas, verduras, frutas frescas y deshidratadas, diversificara más su negocio para atraer nuevos clientes y seguir progresando económicamente.
Con la facilidad que le dan los créditos poco a poco su negocio se ha ido ampliando, cuenta con clientes satisfechos, su familia tiene acceso a mejor alimentación salud y alimentación.
texts.en:
María is very pleased with the support she has received through her previous loan. As they have a positive effect in a short time, she is requesting a new loan to buy drinks, vegetables and fresh and dried fruits. She will further diversify her business in order to attract new customers and continue progressing economically.

Thanks to the loans, it has been easy for her business to expand, little by little; her customers are satisfied and her family has access to better food and health.

loans.use: to buy drinks, vegetables and fresh and dried fruits, to further diversify her business, attract new customers and continue progressing economically.

loans.name: Las Almendras. Group

texts.es:
las almendras esta conformada por ocho integrantes madres solteras, responsable de dies hijos, son originarias de Malpaisillo, lugar que esta ubicado en la zona de occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser trabajadoras, responsables con ganas de superación personal. lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron terminar sus estudios y vieron en la necesidad de trabajar día a día para sacar adelante a sus hijos. en la actualidad trabajan para sacar adelante a sus pequeños hijos brindarle estabilidad que ellos se merecen, y cumplir metas  y objetivos como es brindarles estudios  a sus hijos, superarse en el negocio, y terminar  su casa.

gracias a sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es  Yadira y tiene por actividad económica una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitación, desde hace ocho años que desempeña dicha actividad, el objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio con productos comestibles como : arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, hielos detergente, jugos etc. para que en un futuro no no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Yadira agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Las Almendras is made up of eight members who are single mothers, responsible for ten children. They are from Malpaisillo, a place which is located in the western zone of the country. They are characterized as being hard-working, responsible and with desire to improve themselves. Sadly, due to lack of economic resources, they couldn't finish their schooling and saw the need to work day to day to get their children ahead. Currently, they work to get their young children ahead, provide them with the stability that they deserve, and achieve their goals and objectives such as offering their children education, improving themselves in their businesses, and finishing their houses.

Thanks to her desire to get ahead, the coordinator is Yadira and she works in a grocery store located in her house. She has had this business for eight years. The objective for the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business with food products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, ice, detergents, juices, etc. so that in the not-so-distant future she can get more income. Yadira is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people of limited resources and poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in a general store and purchase grocery products like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, oil, detergent, soap, etc.

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
la asociación comunal santa lucia esta conformada por once integrantes ocho mujeres y tres hombres, madres y padres responsables de quince hijos todos menores de edad, son originarios del Sauce, lugar que se caracteriza por su comida  típica el queso la cuajada producción de leche.  se caracterizan por ser personas trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. en sus ratos libre les gusta disfrutar de sus familia. todos luchan para cumplir sus sueños y metas como es hacer crecer su negocio, proporcionales estabilidad a sus familias, y poder hacerle mejoras a sus casas.

gracias a la ganas de superación personal la coordinadora es Yoveli y tiene por actividad económica una pulperia es una pequeña venta de productos comestibles que vende en cantidades pequeñas, ubicada en su casa de habitación. ella dedica unas doce horas diarias a su negocio  y consisten en vender productos como: azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, jugos, galletas, gaseosas, queso, crema, frutas, hielos, fósforos, etc. para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. santa lucia agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The Santa Lucia communal association is made up of eleven members, eight women and three men, who are responsible mothers and fathers of fifteen children, all minors. They are from El Sauce, a place characterized by its traditional food, the cheese, curds, and milk production. They are characterized as hard-working, responsible people with desire to improve themselves. In their free time they like to enjoy being with their families. All of them struggle to achieve their dreams and goals such as making their business grow, providing their families with stability, and being able to make improvements to their houses.

Thanks to her desire for personal improvement, the coordinator is Yoveli and she has a grocery store which has small sales of food products that she sells small quantities, located in her home. She works about twelve hours each day in her business, which consists of selling products such as sugar, milk, bread, eggs, juices, cookies, soft drinks, cheese, cream, fruits, ice, matches, etc. so that in the not-so-distant future, she can get more income. Santa Lucia is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer them to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: invest in her grocery store with sugar, milk, bread, eggs, juices, and cookies.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a farmer in Kericho who grows maize, raises poultry, and produces dairy. He produces milk and eggs for commercial purposes as opposed to many other rural farmers who are in it for subsistence. Charles also grows maize for food and sales. These commercial activities place him in a better position to engage in other agriculture-related businesses. Charles seeks a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to construct a cow shed. This will help him to significantly manage the animals’ health and hygiene.

He has farmed for at least five years and plans to continue, as he finds farming to not only be fulfilling but also lucrative. However, his biggest challenges are the poor road network and lack of market.

The loan will help Charles construct a cow shed, which will later come in handy when he scales up and introduces zero-grazing. The long-term impact is an increase in productivity and improved animal health. The additional income from this development will go to his children’s education.

Help out a Kenyan entrepreneur with a great vision!

loans.use: to construct a modern cow shed.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is a 60-year-old widow from Candanay Norte, Siquijor.

She has had a tailoring business for 30 years and she has been doing well in her business. She employs her jobless neighbors and teaches them to become master cutters and tailors.

Her business was financed by Paglaum MPC. Recently, she took a loan to purchase an additional sewing machine and cloth for the tailoring business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional sewing machine and cloth for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Divino Niño Sauce Group

texts.es:
LA ASOCIACIÓN DIVINO NIÑO EL SAUCE ESTA CONFORMADA POR  DIES INTEGRANTES NUEVE MUJERES Y UN HOMBRE,  SON ORIGINARIOS DEL  SAUCE, LUGAR  QUE ESTA UBICADO EN LA ZONA NORTE DE LA REGIÓN, SE CARACTERIZA POR SER TRABAJADORES, RESPONSABLES CON GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL, LAMENTABLEMENTE POR FALTA DE RECURSOS ECONÓMICOS NO PUDIERON ESTUDIAR Y SE VIERON EN LA NECESIDAD DE TRABAJAR  PARA AYUDAR CON LOS GASTOS DEL HOGAR. EN LA ACTUALIDAD LUCHAN PARA SACAR ADELANTE A SUS HIJOS, Y BRINDARLES LAS OPORTUNIDADES QUE ELLOS NO TUVIERON.
GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE LA CORDINADORA ES ERMINIA Y TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA LA VENTA DE ROPA NUEVA COMO: PANTALONES, SHORES, FALDAS, BLUSAS, CAMISETAS, ROPA DE NIÑO, ROPA DE CAMA, ROPA INTERIOR, SABANAS ETC. ELLA DEDICA UNAS  DOCE HORAS DIARIAS OFRECIENDO SUS PRODUCTOS, EL NEGOCIO LO TIENE UBICADO EN SU CASA DE HABITACIÓN, Y POR ENCARGO, A CLIENTES FIJOS Y EVENTUALES,  EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO EN LA COMPRA DE MERCEDARIA NUEVA PAR QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS. DIVINO NIÑO AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
The Divino Niño communal association in El Sauce is made up of ten members, nine women and a man. They are from El Sauce, a place that is located in the northern zone of the region. They are characterized as hard-working and responsible with the desire to improve themselves. Sadly, due to the lack of resources, they couldn't go to school and saw the need to work to help with the household expenses. Currently they struggle to get their children ahead and offer them the opportunities that they didn't have.

Thanks to her desire to get ahead, the coordinator is Erminia and she works selling new clothing such as pants, shorts, skirts, blouses, shirts, children's clothing, bedding, lingerie, sheets., etc. She works some twelve hours each day selling her products. The business is located in her home and to order. She has regular and occasional customers and the goal of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business in purchasing new merchandise so that in the not-so-distant future she can get more income. Divino Niño is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer them to have dignified means of work.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as pants, shorts, skirts, blouses, shirts, children's clothing, bedding, lingerie, sheets, etc.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Working in the field is one of the most difficult jobs nowadays because of the great effort needed to make progress. However, Daniel is a man who has never given up in spite of any circumstances that occur. He is always ready to get resources for his family. He gets up at the first hour in the morning in order to tend to his business of raising dairy cows and selling poultry and vegetables, as well as some personal business (motorcycle business) he engages in to supplement the meager income he earns. 

Daniel is seeking a loan to purchase modern farming implements. He realized that he is working increasingly longer and harder on his farm. The workmen in the area are currently doing tasks on the farm previously performed by women. They have been forced to take over as their wives are left at home doing household chores. Therefore, the tools men use are of great importance for improving productivity and yields and reducing time and physical effort. There are health implications as well in using poor traditional tools. The increased income from the use of better tools will help him meet business related expenses. When asked, "How will this loan benefit your family?" Daniel replied, "I will be able to educate my children."

loans.use: to purchase modern farming implements

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe, 38 years old, is a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. She is happily married to Juan, a tricycle driver, and has children. Their family may not have the luxuries of life but they are happy and content that they can eat three times a day and can send their children to school.

Maria Fe has operated a tricycle for ten years which her  husband drives. A tricycle carries up to four passengers. In the Philippines, especially in the provinces like Palawan, the tricycle is a common means of transportation. Jeepneys and buses are limited. Very few people own a vehicle. The town people usually ride a tricycle from their homes to market, church, to schools and to other destinations within their community. These vehicles even transport people from one town to the other. 

To help her continue and improve her tricycle service, she is requesting a 50000 PHP loan, which she will use for maintenance of her tricycle and buy a secondhand side car. It is important that her tricycle is regularly maintained to ensure safe and efficient service. Her tricycle services mostly students in going to school. 

Maria Fe dreams of acquiring a small bus to service more students in their area. She wishes for all her children to finish college to allow them better opportunities in life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for her tricycle's maintenance and buy a second hand side car.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick, at heart, is a resourceful, loving man. His fatherly love has been enough to show him that he needs to work hard to help his children get ahead with excellent values and education. 

Fredrick, 52, is a smallholder farmer in the Kitale area of Kenya. In the past twenty years, he has bred more than one dairy cow and has developed his farm. He has also planted and sold a variety of crops. He says the secret to his success is thinking of farming as a way to make money, not just as a traditional way of life – adopting new technologies and methods, crop diversification, record-keeping and good planning also help. 

Fredrick was unable to study to get a professional career because of the economic situation that his family faced. However, he never gave up and he has been practicing farming. Because of how much he likes farming, he has even nicknamed one of his cows, which makes him a very proud farmer, especially when he is milking his cows. Through his dairy cow, he is able to get between 5-10 liters a day, and this helps him support his family. 

Fredrick also practices crop farming, but he has not been making good profits because of poor farming implements, and that is why he is kindly seeking a loan to buy farm implements. Through the loan, he will be able to buy high-quality seeds, good fertilizer, and pesticides that he will use to greatly improve his crop production. 

Modern farming requires the use of modern techniques; using high-quality seeds will assure him of a bumper harvest and hence, increased profit levels. Fredrick is visionary, and his goal for the season is to boost his crop production and be able to get more crop output than the previous year. All this can be achieved through lenders’ help and goodwill. Fredrick believes that through the loan, he will turn around his family life and be able to give his children a solid educational background. This loan will be Fredrick’s way out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy farm implements

loans.name: Santos Genoveva

texts.es:
Santos, cría y vende cerdos, lo hace desde aproximadamente 8 años, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00 am. a 5:00 pm., lo atiende sola y aprendió el oficio cuando le colaboraba a su madre, la ventaja que tiene en su negocio es que ya es muy reconocida en la zona y vende los cerdos a buen precio; su familia está integrada por su compañero de vida y tres hijos con edades de 10, 9 y 8 años de edad.
En la busca de herramientas para mantener su negocio en el mercado ha decidido solicitar un crédito para comprar cerdos, concentrados y vitaminas, incrementara su inventario y cuidara mejor a sus animales, espera ampliar su negocio y mejorar las circunstancias económicas actuales.
Santos sueña con darle a su familia un estilo de vida digno, tener un negocio más grande y vender otro tipo de animales.
texts.en:
Santos raises and sells pigs. She has done this for approximately 8 years and her work schedule is from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm. She cares for them alone and learned the job when she worked with her mother. The advantage that her business has is that it is very well-known in the zone and she sells her pigs at a good price. Her family is made up of her life partner and three children ages 10, 9 and 8.

In search of the tools to keep her business in the market, she has decided to ask for a loan to purchase pigs, concentrated feed, and vitamins. She will increase her inventory and care for her animals better. She hopes to expand her business and improve her current economic situation.

Santos dreams of giving her family a dignified lifestyle, of having a larger business and selling other types of animals.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, concentrated feed and vitamins, she will increase her inventory and will care for her animals better.

loans.name: Lenie

texts.en:
Her name is Lenie, aged 40, a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. Married to Marlon, a driver, and mother to their children, who are all going to school. Life maybe hard but God has been faithful to them. They may not have luxuries, but they are thankful they live in the beautiful island of Coron.

Her husband's salary as a driver is barely enough to raise a family, so Lenie thought of going into buying and selling ready to wear clothes. She buys RTW clothes from a wholesaler and sells them at retail price. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices and the many options she offers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.

To help her continue operation of her business, she is requesting a 45,000 PHP loan which she will use to buy RTW merchandise items such as different styles of wearing apparel for women, men and children. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and the financial help that will be given her, for it will surely help cover her family's basic needs and for her children's education.

Lenie hopes to be able to expand her business in the coming years. She wants her children to earn a college degree and see them become professionals. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for ready to wear clothes to sell.

loans.name: Aminta Elizabeth

texts.es:
Aminta, es casada, es casada, vive con sus dos hijas de 13 y 7 años de edad, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos para obtener ingresos y solventar las necesidades de su hogar, su negocio está funcionando desde hace 3 años, su horario de labores es de seis de la mañana a seis de la tarde, por el momento no presenta dificultades, el oficio lo heredo de su familia.
Requiere de un préstamo para tener recursos con los que se limitara a comprar pollos recién nacidos y concentrado para alimentarlos, los cuidara y mantendrá saludables para poder venderlos a sus clientes, espera que al fortalecer su negocio esté sea más competitivo y le genere más ganancias.
Los sueños que ella tiene son ampliar su negocio y apoyar a sus hijos a que finalicen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Aminta is married and lives with her two daughters, ages 13 and 7. She works raising chickens to get income and cover the household necessities. She has had her business for 3 years. Her work schedule is from six in the morning to six in the evening. At the moment, there are no difficulties. She inherited the trade from her family.

She needs a loan to have the resources with which she will just buy recently-born chicks and concentrated feed for them. She will care for them and keep them healthy to be able to sell them to her customers. She hopes that upon strengthening her business, it will be more competitive and will generate more earnings.

The dreams she has are to expand her business and support her children so they finish their education.

loans.use: to purchase recently-born chicks and concentrated feed for them, she will care for them and keep them healthy to be able to sell them to her customers.

loans.name: David Alberto

texts.es:
David, de 18 años de edad, está estudiando séptimo grado los fines de semana, proviene de una familia de escasos recursos, sus padres lo abandonaron y lo dejaron al cuidado de su abuela y una tía, ellas le han ayudado para que él pueda salir adelante.

David, se dedica a trabajar la agricultura y también como jornalero, cultiva en un terreno que le pertenece a su tía, trabaja junto a un primo y el terreno donde cultivan está a 15 minutos y el horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 12:00 del mediodía y después de eso le ayuda a su abuela a realizar los quehaceres del hogar, porque ella es de avanzada edad. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar abono, plaguicidas y herbicidas para aplicarlos a sus cultivos, con esto asegurará una buena producción de granos.

David, desea en un futuro poder comprar un terreno para construir su casa, en donde pueda formar una familia, pero además desea comenzar un proyecto que como familia tiene con su abuela, el cual es comenzar a cultivar hortalizas.
texts.en:
David, 18 years old, is studying seventh grade on the weekends. He comes from a family of limited resources, his parents abandoned him and left him in the care of his grandmother and an aunt. They have helped him so that he can get ahead.

David works in agriculture and also as a day laborer. He works a plot of land that belongs to his aunt. He works with his cousin and the land they cultivate is 15 minutes away and his work schedule is from 6:00 am to 12:00 noon and, after that, he helps his grandmother do the household chores because she is elderly.

The loan will be used to purchase manure, pesticides, and herbicides to apply them to his crops, with this he will assure a good grain production.

David wants to be able to purchase a plot of land in the future to build a home, where he can form a family. But, in addition, he wants to start a project that as a family he has with his grandmother, which is to begin growing vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase manure, pesticides and herbicides to apply to his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: EL SEÑOR ES CASADO Y ESTA EN ESPERA DEL NACIMIENTO DE SU PRIMER HIJO, EL EMBARAZO DE SU ESPOSA FUE DIAGNOSTICADO DE ALTA RIESGO POR LO QUE EL NACIMIENTO DEL BEBE DEBERÁ SER POR CESÁREA PARA EVITAR ALGUNA COMPLICACIÓN. LAMENTABLEMENTE NO CUENTA CON LOS RECURSOS SUFICIENTES YA QUE TRABAJA COMO OBRERO EN UNA EMPRESA Y SUS INGRESOS SON BAJOS.
texts.en:
He is married and expecting the birth of his first child. His wife's pregnancy was diagnosed as high risk. Therefore, the birth needs to be by cesarean in order to avoid any complications.

Sadly, he does not have enough resources because he works as a worker in a company, and his earnings are low.

loans.use: to pay for a cesarean birth.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
Her name is Luisa, aged 58, from the island of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. Being single is the biggest challenge in her life, but by God's grace she is healthy and happy at her age. She has put up a small grocery store and sells rice cakes to support herself and help her loved ones.

Luisa has operated a general store for many years already, which really helped in her daily sustenance. Almost all her products are essential household items and food. She earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Aside from this she also makes rice cakes, which is a favorite in their community.

She is humbly seeking assistance of a 17,000 PHP loan which she will use to buy grocery items and pay for the ingredients of rice cakes which she sells at her store. She needs to fill her store with canned goods, instant noodles, biscuits, eggs, oil, beverages and toiletries to better serve her community. Her store means a lot to her for this is her source of income. She is praising God and you for your positive response.

Luisa dreams to expand her small store into a big grocery store. She prays for God's guidance and protection for her loved ones. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and ingredients to prepare rice cakes for sale.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
María, de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor.

María, es una persona muy responsable, hace algún tiempo adquirió un créditos con CREDICAMPO para sembrar granos básicos, pero debido a la sequía perdió su cosecha y no pudo cancelar el crédito.

María, actualmente trabaja en una venta de frescos naturales, para poder cancelar la deuda pendiente, porque aparte del daño que causo la sequía, el padre de su pareja se enveneno cuando fumigando el cultivo y ellos tuvieron que asumir los gastos médicos de él y agotar sus recursos.

Ahora María, solicita un nuevo crédito para terminar de cancelar el anterior y poder sembrar en esta época, para poder salir adelante con su familia. 

Ella sueña con sacar a su familia adelante y terminar de cancelar los créditos.
texts.en:
María, age 39, went to school through the first grade. She is in a relationship, and her life partner is a farmer. María is a very responsible person. Some time ago she got a loan from CrediCampo to plant basic grains. However, due to the drought she lost her harvest and was not able to repay the loan.

María currently works selling natural soft drinks in order to be able to repay the pending debt. And, besides the damage caused by the drought, her life partner's father was poisoned when fumigating the crops. They had to assume his medical expenses and deplete their resources.

María is now requesting a new loan to finish repaying the previous one and to be able to plant this season. She will do this in order to be able to get ahead with her family. She dreams of getting her family ahead and of finishing the repayment of the loans.

loans.use: to finish repaying the previous loan and to be able to plant this season.

loans.name: Hilda Nohemy

texts.es:
Hilda, de 20 años de edad, es una señorita con muchas aspiraciones y deseos de superación, estudio hasta segundo año de bachillerato, no logro continuar por falta de recursos económicos, está soltera y vive con su mamá y sus hermanos.

Hilda, desde muy pequeña se ha dedicado a los oficios del hogar y a atender su negocio de venta de ropa que tiene su familia hace mucho tiempo; pero también en su hogar producen pan para vender y esa es otra fuente de ingresos muy estable y bastante segura para ellos, es por eso que tiene que levantarse muy temprano, para empezar realizar diferentes labores de negocio y oficios del hogar. 

Hilda, actualmente solo trabaja con su familia y no tiene ningún negocio propio, es por eso que ha decidido buscar una fuente de ingresos económicos que sea propia.- Hilda, está solicitando el préstamo para establecer una venta de helados (sorbetes), pero no dispone de todo el dinero para poder invertir. 

Hilda, sueña con asistir a la universidad, pero su familia no dispone de muchos recursos económicos para poder ayudarle, pero con la implementación de su negocio, pretende ahorrar diariamente para seguir estudiando; además desea hacer poco a poco una pequeña casa para ella.
texts.en:
Hilda, 20 years old, is a young woman with many aspirations and desires to improve herself. She went to school up to the second year of secondary. She didn't manage to continue because of the lack of resources. She is single and lives with her mother and siblings.

Since she was very little, Hilda has worked taking care of the household tasks and working in the business selling clothing that her family has had for a long time. But also, in her house, they make bread to sell and this is another very stable and rather secure source of income for them. For this, she has to get up very early to begin to do the different tasks for the business and the household chores.

Hilda currently only works with her family and doesn't have any type of business of her own. For this, she has decided to look for a source of income that would be her own. Hilda is asking for a loan to establish a business selling ice cream (sorbets), but she doesn't have all of the money to be able to invest.

Hilda drams of going to university, but her family doesn't have a lot of resources to be able to help her but, with starting her business, she plans to save daily to continue studying. In addition, she wants to build a small house for herself little by little.

loans.use: to establish a business selling ice cream (sorbets).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase manure, pesticides and herbicides for planting.

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is a 46-year-old married woman from the village of Saakadze. She has only her invalid husband, who gets a monthly pension from the local government.

Nino works hard to make financial stability and good living conditions for her family. She works at the electric energy company and gets a 200 GEL fixed salary, but that is really hardly enough for covering even basic needs.

Nino decided to make an additional source of income and requested financial support. The startup program, a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables poor people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. Her application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of 550 GEL and purchase pay box machines (which is used for paying communal taxes and different service fees) and set them through the area. Nino will get a private source of income and somehow increase the financial conditions of her family.

The Start Up credit will be a great support for the family, as their income will be significantly increased because of Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase paybox machines and get a private source of income.

loans.name: Nou Vle Sa Chanje

texts.en:
Marie-Denise is a humble lady that lives in Leogane.Thanks to her leadership, her community-based VSLA has been empowering women in her areas.

The group is composed of 11 men and 16 women. Last year, they saved $950 dollars and they generated $94 as net income for the group over nine months. More than 50% of the members are fruit retailers.

Today they are connected to Fonkoze, their first-time microfinance institution, and they are looking for a loan to increase their capital of savings. Marie-Denise is portrayed left in the picture. Raymond (middle) and Carline (right). Your contribution will help more schooling for their children and more economic activity for them.

loans.use: to buy 50 baskets of fruits members for members to sell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una joven mujer soltera y muy trabajadora, sufre de fuertes dolores al masticar sus alimentos ocasionados por sus molares fracturadas, ella necesita endodoncias, postes y coronas para no perder sus piezas dentales. Desafortunadamente no cuenta con el dinero necesario para poder atender su problema de salud dental, ya que ella es el único sustento de sus padres.
texts.en:
She is a single and very hard-working young woman. She suffers from severe pain when chewing, which is caused by her broken molars. She needs root canals, posts, and crowns so that she does not lose her teeth.

Unfortunately, she does not have the money needed to be able to take care of her dental health. She is the only support of her parents.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Sol De Oro Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SOL DE ORO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Delia ella es soltera y tiene 46 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de librería.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrowers belong to the Sol de Oro communal bank. This bank is located in Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province and Cusco department.

The borrower is Delia. She is single and 46 years old and has 4 children. She works in her business of a grocery store. She sells basic products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies. The borrower works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has had this business for 5 years and it is going very well for her. The borrower's dream is to expand her grocery store business. The borrower asks for the loan to purchase rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

The borrower attached to the group photo took the photo after the meeting because she asked permission due to work reasons.

The other borrowers work at a business selling candies, a business selling clothing, a grocery store business and a bookstore business.

The borrower is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this platform and promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

loans.name: Ingris Maricela

texts.es:
Ingris, de 22 años de edad, está estudiando primer año en la carrera licenciatura en ingles en la universidad, está soltera y no tiene hijos, en su casa vive junto a su mamá, un hermano, su cuñada y una sobrina.

Ingris, junto a su familia se dedican al cuido de aves de corral, al cultivo de maíz y frijol y cuando es la temporada se dedican a moler caña y a vender los derivados  como dulce de atado, batidos y miel una vez al año.

El crédito será invertido para comprar abonos, herbicidas y plaguicidas para aplicarlos a sus cultivos de maíz y frijol, así como también le aplicarán un poco de abono a la caña, para tener mejores resultados en la producción, teniendo estos productos agrícolas, ellos podrán aplicarlos en el tiempo justo, para asegurar una buena cosecha, así mismo la alimentación de la familia estará segura.

Ella desea poder graduarse y trabajar como maestra de inglés, pues ese ha sido su sueño siempre; pero además desea poder construir una casa propia, donde ella pueda formar su propia familia y tener dos hijos.
texts.en:
Ingris, 22 years old, is in her first year of studying for her English university degree. She is single without children. She lives at home with her mother, a brother, sister-in-law, and a niece.

Ingris and her family are dedicated to the care of poultry, growing corn and beans and during the season they grind cane selling derivatives such as processed cane wrapped in corn husks which is tied and sold in bundles, sugar cane candy, and honey once a year.

The loan will be used to buy fertilizer, herbicides and pesticides to apply to their corn and bean crops and also to apply a little fertilizer to the cane in order to have best results in the harvest.
